arabic_text: لَا ٱلشَّمْسُ يَنۢبَغِى لَهَآ أَن تُدْرِكَ ٱلْقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيْلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِى فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
translation: The sun cannot overtake the moon, nor can the night outrun the day: each floats in [its own] orbit.

arabic_text: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
translation: Another sign for them is that We carried their seed in the laden Ark,

arabic_text: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِۦ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
translation: and We have made similar things for them to ride in.

arabic_text: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ
translation: If We wished, We could drown them, and there would be no one to help them: they could not be saved.

arabic_text: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَـٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
translation: Only by Our mercy could they be reprieved to enjoy life for a while.

arabic_text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
translation: Yet when they are told, ‘Beware of what lies before and behind you, so that you may be given mercy,’

arabic_text: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍ مِّنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
translation: they ignore every single sign that comes to them from their Lord,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُۥٓ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
translation: and when they are told, ‘Give to others out of what God has provided for you,’ the disbelievers say to the believers, ‘Why should we feed those that God could feed if He wanted? You must be deeply misguided.’

arabic_text: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
translation: And they say, ‘When will this promise be fulfilled, if what you say is true?’

arabic_text: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
translation: But all they are waiting for is a single blast that will overtake them while they are still arguing with each other.

arabic_text: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
translation: They will have no time to make bequests, nor will they have the chance to return to their own people.

arabic_text: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ
translation: The Trumpet will be sounded and- lo and behold!- they will rush out to their Lord from their graves.

arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَـٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
translation: They will say, ‘Alas for us! Who has resurrected us from our resting places?’ [They will be told], ‘This is what the Lord of Mercy promised, and the messengers told the truth.’

arabic_text: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
translation: It was just one single blast and then- lo and behold!- they were all brought before Us.

arabic_text: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
translation: ‘Today, no soul will be wronged in the least: you will only be repaid for your deeds.

arabic_text: إِنَّ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى شُغُلٍ فَـٰكِهُونَ
translation: The people of Paradise today are happily occupied-

arabic_text: هُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُهُمْ فِى ظِلَـٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ
translation: they and their spouses- seated on couches in the shade.

arabic_text: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
translation: There they have fruit and whatever they ask for.

arabic_text: سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ
translation: “Peace,” a word from the Lord of Mercy.

arabic_text: وَٱمْتَـٰزُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
translation: But step aside today, you guilty ones.

arabic_text: ۞ أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
translation: Children of Adam, did I not command you not to serve Satan, for he was your sworn enemy,

arabic_text: وَأَنِ ٱعْبُدُونِى ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
translation: but to serve Me? This is the straight path.

arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْقِلُونَ
translation: He has led great numbers of you astray. Did you not use your reason?

arabic_text: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
translation: So this is the Fire that you were warned against.

arabic_text: ٱصْلَوْهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
translation: Enter it today, because you went on ignoring [my commands].’

arabic_text: ٱلْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
translation: On that Day We shall seal up their mouths, but their hands will speak to Us, and their feet bear witness to everything they have done.

arabic_text: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَٱسْتَبَقُوا۟ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
translation: If it had been Our will, We could have taken away their sight. They would have struggled to find the way, but how could they have seen it?

arabic_text: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
translation: If it had been Our will, We could have paralysed them where they stood, so that they could not move forward or backward.

arabic_text: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِى ٱلْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
translation: If We extend anyone’s life, We reverse his development. Do they not use their reason?

arabic_text: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَـٰهُ ٱلشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْءَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
translation: We have not taught the Prophet poetry, nor could he everhave been a poet.

arabic_text: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
translation: This is a revelation, an illuminating Quran to warn anyone who is truly alive, so that God’s verdict may be passed against the disbelievers.

arabic_text: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَآ أَنْعَـٰمًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَـٰلِكُونَ
translation: Can they not see how, among the things made by Our hands, We have created livestock they control,

arabic_text: وَذَلَّلْنَـٰهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
translation: and made them obedient, so that some can be used for riding, some for food,

arabic_text: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
translation: some for other benefits, and some for drink? Will they not give thanks?

arabic_text: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
translation: Yet they have taken other gods besides God to help them,

arabic_text: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ
translation: though these could not do so even if they called a whole army of them together!

arabic_text: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
translation: So [Prophet] do not be distressed at what they say: We know what they conceal and what they reveal.

arabic_text: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ
translation: Can man not see that We created him from a drop of fluid? Yet- lo and behold!- he disputes openly,

arabic_text: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِىَ خَلْقَهُۥ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْىِ ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ وَهِىَ رَمِيمٌ
translation: producing arguments against Us, forgetting his own creation. He says, ‘Who can give life back to bones after they have decayed?’

arabic_text: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
translation: Say, ‘He who created them in the first place will give them life again: He has full knowledge of every act of creation.

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
translation: It is He who produces fire for you out of the green tree- lo and behold!- and from this you kindle fire.

arabic_text: أَوَلَيْسَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
translation: Is He who created the heavens and earth not able to create the likes of these people? Of course He is! He is the All Knowing Creator:

arabic_text: إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيْـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
translation: when He wills something to be, His way is to say, “Be”- and it is!

arabic_text: فَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
translation: So glory be to Him in whose Hand lies control over all things. It is to Him that you will all be brought back.’

arabic_text: وَٱلصَّـٰٓفَّـٰتِ صَفًّا
translation: By those [angels] ranged in rows,

arabic_text: فَٱلزَّٰجِرَٰتِ زَجْرًا
translation: who rebuke reproachfully

arabic_text: فَٱلتَّـٰلِيَـٰتِ ذِكْرًا
translation: and recite God’s word,

arabic_text: إِنَّ إِلَـٰهَكُمْ لَوَٰحِدٌ
translation: truly your God is One,

arabic_text: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ
translation: Lord of the heavens and earth and everything between them, Lord of every sunrise.

arabic_text: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلْكَوَاكِبِ
translation: We have adorned the lowest heaven with stars,

arabic_text: وَحِفْظًا مِّن كُلِّ شَيْطَـٰنٍ مَّارِدٍ
translation: and made them a safeguard against every rebellious devil:

arabic_text: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍ
translation: they cannot eavesdrop on the Higher Assembly––pelted from every side,

arabic_text: دُحُورًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ وَاصِبٌ
translation: driven away, they will have perpetual torment––

arabic_text: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ ٱلْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌ ثَاقِبٌ
translation: if any [of them] stealthily snatches away a fragment, he will be pursued by a piercing flame.

arabic_text: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُم مِّن طِينٍ لَّازِبٍۭ
translation: So [Prophet], ask the disbelievers: is it harder to create them than other beings We have created? We created them from sticky clay.

arabic_text: بَلْ عَجِبْتَ وَيَسْخَرُونَ
translation: You marvel as they scoff,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ لَا يَذْكُرُونَ
translation: take no heed when they are warned,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا رَأَوْا۟ ءَايَةً يَسْتَسْخِرُونَ
translation: and resort to ridicule when they see a sign,

arabic_text: وَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
translation: saying, ‘This is no more than blatant sorcery.’

arabic_text: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
translation: ‘What! After we have died and become dust and bones, shall we really be raised up again,

arabic_text: أَوَءَابَآؤُنَا ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
translation: along with our forefathers?’

arabic_text: قُلْ نَعَمْ وَأَنتُمْ دَٰخِرُونَ
translation: Say, ‘Yes indeed, and you will be humiliated.’

arabic_text: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
translation: Just one blast and––lo and behold!––they will look

arabic_text: وَقَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
translation: and say, ‘Woe to us! This is the Day of Judgement.’

arabic_text: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
translation: [It will be said], ‘This is the Day of Decision, which you used to deny.

arabic_text: ۞ ٱحْشُرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ وَأَزْوَٰجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ
translation: [Angels], gather together those who did wrong, and others like them, as well as whatever they worshipped

arabic_text: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
translation: beside God, lead them all to the path of Hell,

arabic_text: وَقِفُوهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُم مَّسْـُٔولُونَ
translation: and halt them for questioning:

arabic_text: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنَاصَرُونَ
translation: “Why do you not support each other now?” ’––

arabic_text: بَلْ هُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ مُسْتَسْلِمُونَ
translation: no indeed! They will be in complete submission on that Day––

arabic_text: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
translation: and they will turn on one another accusingly.

arabic_text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ
translation: They will say, ‘You came to us from a position of power.’

arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ بَل لَّمْ تَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
translation: They will say, ‘No! It was you who would not believe-

arabic_text: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَـٰنٍۭ ۖ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا طَـٰغِينَ
translation: we had no power over you- and you were already exceeding all limits.

arabic_text: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَآ ۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ
translation: Our Lord’s sentence on us is just and we must all taste the punishment.

arabic_text: فَأَغْوَيْنَـٰكُمْ إِنَّا كُنَّا غَـٰوِينَ
translation: We led you astray as we ourselves were astray.’

arabic_text: فَإِنَّهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِكُونَ
translation: On that Day they will all share the torment:

arabic_text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
translation: this is how We deal with the guilty.

arabic_text: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
translation: Whenever it was said to them, ‘There is no deity but God,’ they became arrogant,

arabic_text: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍ مَّجْنُونٍۭ
translation: and said, ‘Are we to forsake our gods for a mad poet?’

arabic_text: بَلْ جَآءَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
translation: ‘No: he brought the truth and confirmed the earlier messengers;

arabic_text: إِنَّكُمْ لَذَآئِقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْأَلِيمِ
translation: you will taste the painful torment,

arabic_text: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
translation: and be repaid only according to your deeds.’

arabic_text: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
translation: Not so God’s true servants.

arabic_text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ رِزْقٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
translation: They will have familiar provisions––

arabic_text: فَوَٰكِهُ ۖ وَهُم مُّكْرَمُونَ
translation: fruits- and will be honoured

arabic_text: فِى جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
translation: in gardens of delight;

arabic_text: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ
translation: seated on couches, facing one another.

arabic_text: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِكَأْسٍ مِّن مَّعِينٍۭ
translation: A drink will be passed round among them from a flowing spring:

arabic_text: بَيْضَآءَ لَذَّةٍ لِّلشَّـٰرِبِينَ
translation: white, delicious to those who taste it,

arabic_text: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ
translation: causing no headiness or intoxication.

arabic_text: وَعِندَهُمْ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ عِينٌ
translation: With them will be spouses- modest of gaze and beautiful of eye-

arabic_text: كَأَنَّهُنَّ بَيْضٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
translation: like protected eggs.

arabic_text: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
translation: They will turn to one another with questions:

arabic_text: قَالَ قَآئِلٌ مِّنْهُمْ إِنِّى كَانَ لِى قَرِينٌ
translation: one will say, ‘I had a close companion on earth

arabic_text: يَقُولُ أَءِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصَدِّقِينَ
translation: who used to ask me, “Do you really believe that

arabic_text: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ
translation: after we die and become dust and bone, we shall be brought for judgement?”’

arabic_text: قَالَ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّطَّلِعُونَ
translation: Then he will say, ‘Shall we look for him?’

arabic_text: فَٱطَّلَعَ فَرَءَاهُ فِى سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
translation: He will look down and see him in the midst of the Fire,

arabic_text: قَالَ تَٱللَّهِ إِن كِدتَّ لَتُرْدِينِ
translation: and say to him, ‘By God, you almost brought me to ruin!

arabic_text: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْضَرِينَ
translation: Had it not been for the grace of my Lord, I too would have been taken to Hell.’

arabic_text: أَفَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَيِّتِينَ
translation: Then he will say [to his blessed companions], ‘Are we never to die again after our earlier death?

arabic_text: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
translation: Shall we never suffer?

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
translation: This truly is the supreme triumph!’

arabic_text: لِمِثْلِ هَـٰذَا فَلْيَعْمَلِ ٱلْعَـٰمِلُونَ
translation: Everyone should strive to attain this.

arabic_text: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
translation: Is this the better welcome, or the tree of Zaqqum,

arabic_text: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَـٰهَا فِتْنَةً لِّلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
translation: which we have made a test for the evildoers?

arabic_text: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِىٓ أَصْلِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
translation: This tree grows in the heart of the blazing Fire,

arabic_text: طَلْعُهَا كَأَنَّهُۥ رُءُوسُ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ
translation: and its fruits are like devils’ heads.

arabic_text: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَـَٔاكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنْهَا ٱلْبُطُونَ
translation: They will fill their bellies eating from it;

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ
translation: then drink scalding water on top of it;

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ مَرْجِعَهُمْ لَإِلَى ٱلْجَحِيمِ
translation: then return to the blazing Fire.

arabic_text: إِنَّهُمْ أَلْفَوْا۟ ءَابَآءَهُمْ ضَآلِّينَ
translation: They found their forefathers astray,

arabic_text: فَهُمْ عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَـٰرِهِمْ يُهْرَعُونَ
translation: and rushed to follow in their footsteps- before the disbelievers [of Mecca],

arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ ضَلَّ قَبْلَهُمْ أَكْثَرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
translation: most men in the past went astray,

arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِم مُّنذِرِينَ
translation: even though We sent messengers to warn them.

arabic_text: فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
translation: See how those who were warned met their end!

arabic_text: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
translation: Not so the true servants of God.

arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ نَادَىٰنَا نُوحٌ فَلَنِعْمَ ٱلْمُجِيبُونَ
translation: Noah cried to Us, and how excellent was Our response!

arabic_text: وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
translation: We saved him and his people from great distress,

arabic_text: وَجَعَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُۥ هُمُ ٱلْبَاقِينَ
translation: We let his offspring remain on the earth,

arabic_text: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
translation: We let him be praised by later generations:

arabic_text: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰ نُوحٍ فِى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
translation: ‘Peace be upon Noah among all the nations!’

arabic_text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
translation: This is how We reward those who do good:

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
translation: he was truly one of Our faithful servants.

arabic_text: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ
translation: We drowned the rest.

arabic_text: ۞ وَإِنَّ مِن شِيعَتِهِۦ لَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ
translation: Abraham was of the same faith:

arabic_text: إِذْ جَآءَ رَبَّهُۥ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
translation: he came to his Lord with a devoted heart.

arabic_text: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ
translation: He said to his father and his people, ‘What are you worshipping?

arabic_text: أَئِفْكًا ءَالِهَةً دُونَ ٱللَّهِ تُرِيدُونَ
translation: How can you choose false gods instead of the true God?

arabic_text: فَمَا ظَنُّكُم بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
translation: So what is your opinion about the Lord of all the Worlds?’

arabic_text: فَنَظَرَ نَظْرَةً فِى ٱلنُّجُومِ
translation: then he looked up to the stars.

arabic_text: فَقَالَ إِنِّى سَقِيمٌ
translation: He said, ‘I am sick,’

arabic_text: فَتَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ مُدْبِرِينَ
translation: so [his people] turned away from him and left.

arabic_text: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
translation: He turned to their gods and said, ‘Do you not eat?

arabic_text: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنطِقُونَ
translation: Why do you not speak?’

arabic_text: فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضَرْبًۢا بِٱلْيَمِينِ
translation: then he turned and struck them with his right arm.

arabic_text: فَأَقْبَلُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ يَزِفُّونَ
translation: His people hurried towards him,

arabic_text: قَالَ أَتَعْبُدُونَ مَا تَنْحِتُونَ
translation: but he said, ‘How can you worship things you carve with your own hands,

arabic_text: وَٱللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ وَمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
translation: when it is God who has created you and all your handiwork?’

arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ ٱبْنُوا۟ لَهُۥ بُنْيَـٰنًا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِى ٱلْجَحِيمِ
translation: They said, ‘Build a pyre and throw him into the blazing fire.’

arabic_text: فَأَرَادُوا۟ بِهِۦ كَيْدًا فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْأَسْفَلِينَ
translation: They wanted to harm him, but We humiliated them.

arabic_text: وَقَالَ إِنِّى ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
translation: He said, ‘I will go to my Lord: He is sure to guide me.

arabic_text: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
translation: Lord, grant me a righteous son,’

arabic_text: فَبَشَّرْنَـٰهُ بِغُلَـٰمٍ حَلِيمٍ
translation: so We gave him the good news that he would have a patient son.

arabic_text: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ ٱلسَّعْىَ قَالَ يَـٰبُنَىَّ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰ فِى ٱلْمَنَامِ أَنِّىٓ أَذْبَحُكَ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ ٱفْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِىٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
translation: When the boy was old enough to work with his father, Abraham said, ‘My son, I have seen myself sacrificing you in a dream. What do you think?’ He said, ‘Father, do as you are commanded and, God willing, you will find me steadfast.’

arabic_text: فَلَمَّآ أَسْلَمَا وَتَلَّهُۥ لِلْجَبِينِ
translation: When they had both submitted to God, and he had laid his son down on the side of his face,

arabic_text: وَنَـٰدَيْنَـٰهُ أَن يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ
translation: We called out to him, ‘Abraham,

arabic_text: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ ٱلرُّءْيَآ ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
translation: you have fulfilled the dream.’ This is how We reward those who do good-

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْبَلَـٰٓؤُا۟ ٱلْمُبِينُ
translation: it was a test to prove [their true characters]-

arabic_text: وَفَدَيْنَـٰهُ بِذِبْحٍ عَظِيمٍ
translation: We ransomed his son with a momentous sacrifice,

arabic_text: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
translation: and We let him be praised by succeeding generations:

arabic_text: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ
translation: ‘Peace be upon Abraham!’

arabic_text: كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
translation: This is how We reward those who do good:

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
translation: truly he was one of Our faithful servants.

arabic_text: وَبَشَّرْنَـٰهُ بِإِسْحَـٰقَ نَبِيًّا مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
translation: We gave Abraham the good news of Isaac- a prophet and a righteous man-

arabic_text: وَبَـٰرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ ۚ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌ وَظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِۦ مُبِينٌ
translation: and blessed him and Isaac too: some of their offspring were good, but some clearly wronged themselves.

arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ
translation: We also bestowed Our favour on Moses and Aaron:

arabic_text: وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُمَا وَقَوْمَهُمَا مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
translation: We saved them and their people from great distress;

arabic_text: وَنَصَرْنَـٰهُمْ فَكَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ
translation: We helped them, so they were the ones to succeed;

arabic_text: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمَا ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ٱلْمُسْتَبِينَ
translation: We gave them the Scripture that makes things clear;

arabic_text: وَهَدَيْنَـٰهُمَا ٱلصِّرَٰطَ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمَ
translation: We guided them to the right path;

arabic_text: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِمَا فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
translation: We let them be praised by succeeding generations:

arabic_text: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ
translation: ‘Peace be upon Moses and Aaron!’

arabic_text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
translation: This is how We reward those who do good:

arabic_text: إِنَّهُمَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
translation: truly they were among Our faithful servants.

arabic_text: وَإِنَّ إِلْيَاسَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
translation: Elijah too was one of the messengers.

arabic_text: إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
translation: He said to his people, ‘Have you no fear of God?

arabic_text: أَتَدْعُونَ بَعْلًا وَتَذَرُونَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْخَـٰلِقِينَ
translation: How can you invoke Baal and forsake the Most Gracious Creator,

arabic_text: ٱللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ وَرَبَّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
translation: God, your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers?’

arabic_text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَإِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
translation: but they rejected him. They will be brought to punishment as a consequence;

arabic_text: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
translation: not so the true servants of God.

arabic_text: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
translation: We let him be praised by succeeding generations:

arabic_text: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰٓ إِلْ يَاسِينَ
translation: ‘Peace be to Elijah!’

arabic_text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
translation: This is how We reward those who do good:

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
translation: truly he was one of Our faithful servants.

arabic_text: وَإِنَّ لُوطًا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
translation: Lot was also one of the messengers.

arabic_text: إِذْ نَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ
translation: We saved him and all his family-

arabic_text: إِلَّا عَجُوزًا فِى ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ
translation: except for an old woman who stayed behind-

arabic_text: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ
translation: and We destroyed the rest.

arabic_text: وَإِنَّكُمْ لَتَمُرُّونَ عَلَيْهِم مُّصْبِحِينَ
translation: You [people] pass by their ruins morning

arabic_text: وَبِٱلَّيْلِ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
translation: and night: will you not take heed?

arabic_text: وَإِنَّ يُونُسَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
translation: Jonah too was one of the messengers.

arabic_text: إِذْ أَبَقَ إِلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
translation: He fled to the overloaded ship.

arabic_text: فَسَاهَمَ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُدْحَضِينَ
translation: They cast lots, he suffered defeat,

arabic_text: فَٱلْتَقَمَهُ ٱلْحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
translation: and a great fish swallowed him, for he had committed blameworthy acts.

arabic_text: فَلَوْلَآ أَنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَبِّحِينَ
translation: If he had not been one of those who glorified God,

arabic_text: لَلَبِثَ فِى بَطْنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
translation: he would have stayed in its belly until the Day when all are raised up,

arabic_text: ۞ فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُ بِٱلْعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ سَقِيمٌ
translation: but We cast him out, sick, on to a barren shore,

arabic_text: وَأَنۢبَتْنَا عَلَيْهِ شَجَرَةً مِّن يَقْطِينٍ
translation: and made a gourd tree grow above him.

arabic_text: وَأَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِا۟ئَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ
translation: We sent him to a hundred thousand people or more.

arabic_text: فَـَٔامَنُوا۟ فَمَتَّعْنَـٰهُمْ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
translation: They believed, so We let them live out their lives.

arabic_text: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَلِرَبِّكَ ٱلْبَنَاتُ وَلَهُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
translation: Now [Muhammad], ask the disbelievers: is it true that your Lord has daughters, while they choose sons for themselves?

arabic_text: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَـٰثًا وَهُمْ شَـٰهِدُونَ
translation: Did We create the angels as females while they were watching?

arabic_text: أَلَآ إِنَّهُم مِّنْ إِفْكِهِمْ لَيَقُولُونَ
translation: No indeed! It is one of their lies when they say,

arabic_text: وَلَدَ ٱللَّهُ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
translation: ‘God has begotten.’ How they lie!

arabic_text: أَصْطَفَى ٱلْبَنَاتِ عَلَى ٱلْبَنِينَ
translation: Did He truly choose daughters in preference to sons?

arabic_text: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
translation: What is the matter with you? How do you form your judgements?

arabic_text: أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
translation: Do you not reflect?

arabic_text: أَمْ لَكُمْ سُلْطَـٰنٌ مُّبِينٌ
translation: Do you perhaps have clear authority?

arabic_text: فَأْتُوا۟ بِكِتَـٰبِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
translation: Bring your scriptures, if you are telling the truth.

arabic_text: وَجَعَلُوا۟ بَيْنَهُۥ وَبَيْنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ ٱلْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
translation: They claim that He has kinship with the jinn, yet the jinn themselves know that they will be brought before Him.

arabic_text: سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
translation: God is far above what they attribute to Him-

arabic_text: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
translation: the true servants of God do not do such things-

arabic_text: فَإِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ
translation: and neither you nor what you worship

arabic_text: مَآ أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ بِفَـٰتِنِينَ
translation: can lure away from God any

arabic_text: إِلَّا مَنْ هُوَ صَالِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
translation: except those who will burn in Hell.

arabic_text: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
translation: [The angels say], ‘Every single one of us has his appointed place:

arabic_text: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلصَّآفُّونَ
translation: we are ranged in ranks.

arabic_text: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْمُسَبِّحُونَ
translation: We glorify God.’

arabic_text: وَإِن كَانُوا۟ لَيَقُولُونَ
translation: [The disbelievers] used to say,

arabic_text: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًا مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
translation: ‘If only we had a scripture like previous people,

arabic_text: لَكُنَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
translation: we would be true servants of God,’

arabic_text: فَكَفَرُوا۟ بِهِۦ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
translation: yet now they reject [the Quran]. They will soon realize.

arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ سَبَقَتْ كَلِمَتُنَا لِعِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
translation: Our word has already been given to Our servants the messengers:

arabic_text: إِنَّهُمْ لَهُمُ ٱلْمَنصُورُونَ
translation: it is they who will be helped,

arabic_text: وَإِنَّ جُندَنَا لَهُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ
translation: and the ones who support Our cause will be the winners.

arabic_text: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
translation: So [Prophet] turn away from the disbelievers for a while.

arabic_text: وَأَبْصِرْهُمْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
translation: Watch them: they will soon see.

arabic_text: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
translation: Do they really wish to hasten Our punishment?

arabic_text: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
translation: When it descends on their courtyards, how ter-rible that morning will be for those who were warned!

arabic_text: وَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
translation: [Prophet], turn away from the disbelievers for a while.

arabic_text: وَأَبْصِرْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
translation: Watch them: they will soon see.

arabic_text: سُبْحَـٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
translation: Your Lord, the Lord of Glory, is far above what they attribute to Him.

arabic_text: وَسَلَـٰمٌ عَلَى ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
translation: Peace be upon the messengers

arabic_text: وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
translation: and praise be to God the Lord of all the Worlds.

arabic_text: صٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ذِى ٱلذِّكْرِ
translation: Sad By the Quran with its reminding . . .!

arabic_text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ
translation: Yet the disbelievers are steeped in arrogance and hostility.

arabic_text: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوا۟ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ
translation: How many generations We have destroyed before them! They all cried out, once it was too late, for escape.

arabic_text: وَعَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا سَـٰحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ
translation: The disbelievers think it strange that a prophet of their own people has come to warn them: they say, ‘He is just a lying sorcerer.

arabic_text: أَجَعَلَ ٱلْـَٔالِهَةَ إِلَـٰهًا وَٰحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ عُجَابٌ
translation: How can he claim that all the gods are but one God? What an astonishing thing [to claim]!’

arabic_text: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱمْشُوا۟ وَٱصْبِرُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ يُرَادُ
translation: Their leaders depart, saying, ‘Walk away! Stay faithful to your gods! That is what you must do.

arabic_text: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِى ٱلْمِلَّةِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخْتِلَـٰقٌ
translation: We did not hear any such claim in the last religion: it is all an invention.

arabic_text: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ مِّن ذِكْرِى ۖ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِ
translation: Was the message sent only to him out of all of us?’ In fact they doubt My warning; in fact they have not tasted My punishment yet.

arabic_text: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْوَهَّابِ
translation: Do they possess the treasures of your Lord’s bounty, the Mighty, the All Giving?

arabic_text: أَمْ لَهُم مُّلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَسْبَـٰبِ
translation: Do they control the heavens and earth and everything between? Let them climb their ropes:

arabic_text: جُندٌ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِّنَ ٱلْأَحْزَابِ
translation: their armed alliance is weak and will be crushed.

arabic_text: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو ٱلْأَوْتَادِ
translation: The people of Noah, Ad, and firmly-supported Pharaoh rejected their prophets before them.

arabic_text: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ
translation: Thamud, the people of Lot, and the Forest-Dwellers each formed opposition [against theirs].

arabic_text: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
translation: They all rejected the mes-sengers and they were deservedly struck by My punishment:

arabic_text: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٍ
translation: all the disbelievers here are waiting for is a single blast that cannot be postponed.

arabic_text: وَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
translation: They say, ‘Our Lord! Advance us our share of punishment before the Day of Reckoning!’

arabic_text: ٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
translation: Bear their words patiently [Prophet]. Remember Our servant David, a man of strength who always turned to Us:

arabic_text: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا ٱلْجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ وَٱلْإِشْرَاقِ
translation: We made the mountains join him in glorifying Us at sunset and sunrise;

arabic_text: وَٱلطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةً ۖ كُلٌّ لَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
translation: and the birds, too, in flocks, all echoed his praise.

arabic_text: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ ٱلْخِطَابِ
translation: We strengthened his kingdom; We gave him wisdom and a decisive way of speaking.

arabic_text: ۞ وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا۟ ٱلْمِحْرَابَ
translation: Have you heard the story of the two litigants who climbed into his private quarters?

arabic_text: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ دَاوُۥدَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَٱهْدِنَآ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ
translation: When they reached David, he took fright, but they said, ‘Do not be afraid. We are two litigants, one of whom has wronged the other: judge between us fairly- do not be unjust- and guide us to the right path.

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَآ أَخِى لَهُۥ تِسْعٌ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةً وَلِىَ نَعْجَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِى فِى ٱلْخِطَابِ
translation: This is my brother. He had ninety-nine ewes and I just the one, and he said, “Let me take charge of her,” and overpowered me with his words.’

arabic_text: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِۦ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ ٱلْخُلَطَآءِ لَيَبْغِى بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَقَلِيلٌ مَّا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُۥدُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّـٰهُ فَٱسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُۥ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًا وَأَنَابَ ۩
translation: David said, ‘He has done you wrong by demanding to add your ewe to his flock. Many partners treat each other unfairly. Those who sincerely believe and do good deeds do not do this, but these are very few.’ [Then] David realized that We had been testing him, so he asked his Lord for forgiveness, fell down on his knees, and repented:

arabic_text: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ
translation: We forgave him [his misdeed]. His reward will be nearness to Us, a good place to return to.

arabic_text: يَـٰدَاوُۥدُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَـٰكَ خَلِيفَةً فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌۢ بِمَا نَسُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْحِسَابِ
translation: ‘David, We have given you mastery over the land. Judge fairly between people. Do not follow your desires, lest they divert you from God’s path: those who wander from His path will have a painful torment because they ignore the Day of Reckoning.’

arabic_text: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَـٰطِلًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ
translation: It was not without purpose that We created the heavens and the earth and everything in between. That may be what the disbelievers assume- how they will suffer from the Fire!-

arabic_text: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ كَٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ كَٱلْفُجَّارِ
translation: but would We treat those who believe and do good deeds and those who spread corruption on earth as equal? Would We treat those who are aware of God and those who recklessly break all bounds in the same way?

arabic_text: كِتَـٰبٌ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَـٰرَكٌ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓا۟ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
translation: This is a blessed Scripture which We sent down to you [Muhammad], for people to think about its messages, and for those with understanding to take heed.

arabic_text: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ ۚ نِعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
translation: We gave David Solomon. He was an excellent servant who always turned to God.

arabic_text: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ ٱلصَّـٰفِنَـٰتُ ٱلْجِيَادُ
translation: When well-bred light-footed horses were paraded before him near the close of day,

arabic_text: فَقَالَ إِنِّىٓ أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ ٱلْخَيْرِ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّى حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِٱلْحِجَابِ
translation: he kept saying, ‘My love of fine things is part of my remembering my Lord!’ until [the horses] disappeared from sight-

arabic_text: رُدُّوهَا عَلَىَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلْأَعْنَاقِ
translation: ‘Bring them back!’ [he said] and started to stroke their legs and necks.

arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَـٰنَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
translation: We certainly tested Solomon, reducing him to a mere skeleton on his throne.

arabic_text: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَهَبْ لِى مُلْكًا لَّا يَنۢبَغِى لِأَحَدٍ مِّنۢ بَعْدِىٓ ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْوَهَّابُ
translation: He turned to Us and prayed: ‘Lord forgive me! Grant me such power as no one after me will have- You are the Most Generous Provider.’

arabic_text: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجْرِى بِأَمْرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ
translation: So We gave him power over the wind, which at his request ran gently wherever he willed,

arabic_text: وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّآءٍ وَغَوَّاصٍ
translation: and the jinn––every kind of builder and diver

arabic_text: وَءَاخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِى ٱلْأَصْفَادِ
translation: and others chained in fetters.

arabic_text: هَـٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
translation: ‘This is Our gift, so give or withhold as you wish without account.’

arabic_text: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ
translation: His reward will be nearness to Us, and a good place to return to.

arabic_text: وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَسَّنِىَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ بِنُصْبٍ وَعَذَابٍ
translation: Bring to mind Our servant Job who cried to his Lord, ‘Satan has afflicted me with weariness and suffering.’

arabic_text: ٱرْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَـٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌۢ بَارِدٌ وَشَرَابٌ
translation: ‘Stamp your foot! Here is cool water for you to wash in and drink,’

arabic_text: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهْلَهُۥ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
translation: and We restored his family to him, with many more like them: a sign of Our mercy and a lesson to all who understand.

arabic_text: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَٱضْرِب بِّهِۦ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَـٰهُ صَابِرًا ۚ نِّعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
translation: ‘Take a small bunch of grass in your hand, and strike [her] with that so as not to break your oath.’ We found him patient in adversity; an excellent servant! He, too, always turned to God.

arabic_text: وَٱذْكُرْ عِبَـٰدَنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُو۟لِى ٱلْأَيْدِى وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ
translation: Remember Our servants Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, all men of strength and vision.

arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَخْلَصْنَـٰهُم بِخَالِصَةٍ ذِكْرَى ٱلدَّارِ
translation: We caused them to be devoted to Us through their sincere remembrance of the Final Home:

arabic_text: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِندَنَا لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصْطَفَيْنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
translation: with Us they will be among the elect, the truly good.

arabic_text: وَٱذْكُرْ إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَٱلْيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِّنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
translation: And remember Our servants Ishmael, Elisha, and Dhu ’l-Kifl, each of them truly good.

arabic_text: هَـٰذَا ذِكْرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ
translation: This is a lesson. The devout will have a good place to return to:

arabic_text: جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ مُّفَتَّحَةً لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَبْوَٰبُ
translation: Gardens of lasting bliss with gates wide open.

arabic_text: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ
translation: They will be comfortably seated; they will call for abundant fruit and drink;

arabic_text: ۞ وَعِندَهُمْ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ
translation: they will have well-matched [wives] with modest gaze.

arabic_text: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
translation: ‘This is what you are promised for the Day of Reckoning:

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ
translation: Our provision for you will never end.’

arabic_text: هَـٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّـٰغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَـَٔابٍ
translation: But the evildoers will have the worst place to return to:

arabic_text: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ ٱلْمِهَادُ
translation: Hell to burn in, an evil place to stay-

arabic_text: هَـٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌ وَغَسَّاقٌ
translation: all this will be theirs: let them taste it- a scalding, dark, foul fluid,

arabic_text: وَءَاخَرُ مِن شَكْلِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجٌ
translation: and other such torments.

arabic_text: هَـٰذَا فَوْجٌ مُّقْتَحِمٌ مَّعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُوا۟ ٱلنَّارِ
translation: [It will be said], ‘Here is another crowd of people rushing headlong to join you.’ [The response will be], ‘They are not welcome! They will burn in the Fire.’

arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ أَنتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ ٱلْقَرَارُ
translation: They will say to them, ‘You are not welcome! It was you who brought this on us, an evil place to stay,’

arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَـٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِى ٱلنَّارِ
translation: adding, ‘Our Lord, give double punishment to those who brought this upon us.’

arabic_text: وَقَالُوا۟ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَشْرَارِ
translation: They will say, ‘Why do we not see those we thought were bad

arabic_text: أَتَّخَذْنَـٰهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ
translation: and took as a laughing-stock? Have our eyes missed them?’

arabic_text: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ ٱلنَّارِ
translation: This is how it will really be: the inhabitants of the Fire will blame one another in this way.

arabic_text: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٌ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
translation: [Prophet] say, ‘I am only here to give warning. There is no god but God the One, the All Powerful,

arabic_text: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ
translation: Lord of the heavens and earth and everything between, the Almighty, the Most Forgiving.’

arabic_text: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَؤٌا۟ عَظِيمٌ
translation: Say, ‘This message is a mighty one,

arabic_text: أَنتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ
translation: yet you ignore it.

arabic_text: مَا كَانَ لِىَ مِنْ عِلْمٍۭ بِٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰٓ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
translation: I have no knowledge of what those on high discuss:

arabic_text: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
translation: it is only revealed to me that I am here to give clear warning.’

arabic_text: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَـٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّن طِينٍ
translation: Your Lord said to the angels, ‘I will create a man from clay.

arabic_text: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَـٰجِدِينَ
translation: When I have shaped him and breathed from My Spirit into him, bow down before him.’

arabic_text: فَسَجَدَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
translation: The angels all bowed down together,

arabic_text: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ ٱسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
translation: but not Iblis, who was too proud. He became a rebel.

arabic_text: قَالَ يَـٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَىَّ ۖ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْعَالِينَ
translation: God said, ‘Iblis, what prevents you from bowing down to the man I have made with My own hands? Are you too high and mighty?’

arabic_text: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌ مِّنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِى مِن نَّارٍ وَخَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن طِينٍ
translation: Iblis said, ‘I am better than him: You made me from fire, and him from clay.’

arabic_text: قَالَ فَٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ
translation: ‘Get out of here! You are rejected:

arabic_text: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
translation: My rejection will follow you till the Day of Judgement!’

arabic_text: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
translation: but Iblis said, ‘My Lord, grant me respite until the Day when they are raised from the dead,’

arabic_text: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ
translation: so He said, ‘You have respite

arabic_text: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْوَقْتِ ٱلْمَعْلُومِ
translation: till the Appointed Day.’

arabic_text: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
translation: Iblis said, ‘I swear by Your might! I will tempt all

arabic_text: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
translation: but Your true servants.’

arabic_text: قَالَ فَٱلْحَقُّ وَٱلْحَقَّ أَقُولُ
translation: God said, ‘This is the truth- I speak only the truth-

arabic_text: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
translation: I will fill Hell with you and all those that follow you.’

arabic_text: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ
translation: [Prophet], say, ‘I ask no reward from you for this, nor do I claim to be what I am not:

arabic_text: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
translation: this is only a warning for all people.

arabic_text: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُۥ بَعْدَ حِينٍۭ
translation: In time you will certainly come to know its truth.’

arabic_text: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
translation: This Scripture is sent down from God the Mighty, the Wise.

arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَٱعْبُدِ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
translation: It is We who sent down the Scripture to you [Prophet] with the Truth, so worship God with your total devotion:

arabic_text: أَلَا لِلَّهِ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلْخَالِصُ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ مَا نَعْبُدُهُمْ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ زُلْفَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ فِى مَا هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى مَنْ هُوَ كَـٰذِبٌ كَفَّارٌ
translation: true devotion is due to God alone. [As for] those who choose other protectors beside Him, saying, ‘We only worship them because they bring us nearer to God,’ God Himself will judge between them regarding their differences. God does not guide any ungrateful liar.

arabic_text: لَّوْ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا لَّٱصْطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ ۖ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
translation: God could have chosen any of His creation He willed for offspring, but He is far above this! He is the One, the Almighty.

arabic_text: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ يُكَوِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ عَلَى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ ٱلنَّهَارَ عَلَى ٱلَّيْلِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّ يَجْرِى لِأَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۗ أَلَا هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ
translation: He created the heavens and earth for a true purpose; He wraps the night around the day and the day around the night; He has subjected the sun and moon to run their courses for an appointed time; He is truly the Mighty, the Forgiving.

arabic_text: خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍ وَٰحِدَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَزْوَٰجٍ ۚ يَخْلُقُكُمْ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ خَلْقًا مِّنۢ بَعْدِ خَلْقٍ فِى ظُلُمَـٰتٍ ثَلَـٰثٍ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصْرَفُونَ
translation: He created you all from a single being, from which He made its mate; He gave you four kinds of livestock in pairs; He creates you in your mothers’ wombs, in one stage after another, in threefold depths of darkness. Such is God, your Lord; He holds control, there is no god but Him. How can you turn away?

arabic_text: إِن تَكْفُرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِىٌّ عَنكُمْ ۖ وَلَا يَرْضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ ٱلْكُفْرَ ۖ وَإِن تَشْكُرُوا۟ يَرْضَهُ لَكُمْ ۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۗ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرْجِعُكُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
translation: If you are ungrateful, remember God has no need of you, yet He is not pleased by ingrati-tude in His servants; if you are grateful, He is pleased [to see] it in you. No soul will bear another’s burden. You will return to your Lord in the end and He will inform you of what you have done: He knows well what is in the depths of [your] hearts.

arabic_text: ۞ وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ ضُرٌّ دَعَا رَبَّهُۥ مُنِيبًا إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُۥ نِعْمَةً مِّنْهُ نَسِىَ مَا كَانَ يَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ مِن قَبْلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندَادًا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ تَمَتَّعْ بِكُفْرِكَ قَلِيلًا ۖ إِنَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ
translation: When man suffers some affliction, he prays to his Lord and turns to Him, but once he has been granted a favour from God, he forgets the One he had been praying to and sets up rivals to God, to make others stray from His path. Say, ‘Enjoy your ingratitude for a little while: you will be one of the inhabitants of the Fire.’

arabic_text: أَمَّنْ هُوَ قَـٰنِتٌ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيْلِ سَاجِدًا وَقَآئِمًا يَحْذَرُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ وَيَرْجُوا۟ رَحْمَةَ رَبِّهِۦ ۗ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِى ٱلَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
translation: What about someone who worships devoutly during the night, bowing down, standing in prayer, ever mindful of the life to come, hoping for his Lord’s mercy? Say, ‘How can those who know be equal to those who do not know?’ Only those who have understanding will take heed.

arabic_text: قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌ ۗ وَأَرْضُ ٱللَّهِ وَٰسِعَةٌ ۗ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
translation: Say, ‘[God says], believing servants, be mindful of your Lord! Those who do good in this world will have a good reward- God’s earth is wide––and those who persevere patiently will be given a full and unstinting reward.’

arabic_text: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
translation: Say, ‘I have been commanded to serve God, dedicating my worship entirely to Him.

arabic_text: وَأُمِرْتُ لِأَنْ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
translation: I have been commanded to be the first to submit.’

arabic_text: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّى عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
translation: Say, ‘I fear the torment of a terrible Day if I disobey my Lord.’

arabic_text: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعْبُدُ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُۥ دِينِى
translation: Say, ‘It is God I serve, dedicating my worship entirely to Him-

arabic_text: فَٱعْبُدُوا۟ مَا شِئْتُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَهْلِيهِمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ أَلَا ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْخُسْرَانُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
translation: you may serve whatever you please beside Him.’ Say, ‘The true losers are the ones who will lose themselves and their people on the Day of Resurrection: that is the most obvious loss.

arabic_text: لَهُم مِّن فَوْقِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِن تَحْتِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ عِبَادَهُۥ ۚ يَـٰعِبَادِ فَٱتَّقُونِ
translation: They will have layers of Fire above them and below.’ This is how God puts fear into His servants: My servants, beware of Me.

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱجْتَنَبُوا۟ ٱلطَّـٰغُوتَ أَن يَعْبُدُوهَا وَأَنَابُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ لَهُمُ ٱلْبُشْرَىٰ ۚ فَبَشِّرْ عِبَادِ
translation: There is good news for those who shun the worship of false gods and turn to God, so [Prophet] give good news to My servants

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَمِعُونَ ٱلْقَوْلَ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ أَحْسَنَهُۥٓ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
translation: who listen to what is said and follow what is best. These are the ones God has guided; these are the people of understanding.

arabic_text: أَفَمَنْ حَقَّ عَلَيْهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ
translation: What about the one who has been sentenced to punishment? Can you [Prophet] rescue those already in the Fire?

arabic_text: لَـٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ لَهُمْ غُرَفٌ مِّن فَوْقِهَا غُرَفٌ مَّبْنِيَّةٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ لَا يُخْلِفُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمِيعَادَ
translation: But those who are mindful of their Lord will have lofty dwellings built for them, one above the other, graced with flowing streams. This is a promise from God: God does not break His promise.

arabic_text: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَسَلَكَهُۥ يَنَـٰبِيعَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ يُخْرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرْعًا مُّخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَٰنُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصْفَرًّا ثُمَّ يَجْعَلُهُۥ حُطَـٰمًا ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
translation: Have you not considered that God sends water down from the sky, guides it along to form springs in the earth, and then, with it, brings forth vegetation of various colours, which later withers, turns yellow before your eyes, and is crumbled to dust at His command? There is truly a reminder in this for those who have understanding.

arabic_text: أَفَمَن شَرَحَ ٱللَّهُ صَدْرَهُۥ لِلْإِسْلَـٰمِ فَهُوَ عَلَىٰ نُورٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْقَـٰسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُم مِّن ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
translation: What about the one whose heart God has opened in devotion to Him, so that he walks in light from his Lord? Alas for those whose hearts harden at the mention of God! They have clearly lost their way.

arabic_text: ٱللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْحَدِيثِ كِتَـٰبًا مُّتَشَـٰبِهًا مَّثَانِىَ تَقْشَعِرُّ مِنْهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمْ وَقُلُوبُهُمْ إِلَىٰ ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهْدِى بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍ
translation: God has sent down the most beautiful of all teachings: a Scripture that is consistent and draws comparisons; that causes the skins of those in awe of their Lord to shiver. Then their skins and their hearts soften at the mention of God: such is God’s guidance. He guides with it whoever He will; no one can guide those God leaves to stray.

arabic_text: أَفَمَن يَتَّقِى بِوَجْهِهِۦ سُوٓءَ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ وَقِيلَ لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ ذُوقُوا۟ مَا كُنتُمْ تَكْسِبُونَ
translation: What about the one who will only have his bare face to protect him from his terrible suffering on the Day of Resurrection? It will be said to the evildoers, ‘Taste what you have earned.’

arabic_text: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
translation: Others before them also disbelieved, and the punishment fell on them unawares:

arabic_text: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْخِزْىَ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ
translation: God gave them the punishment of disgrace in this world to taste; the punishment will be even harder in the Hereafter, if only they knew.

arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ ضَرَبْنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِى هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
translation: In this Quran, We have put forward all kinds of illustration for people, so that they may take heed-

arabic_text: قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيْرَ ذِى عِوَجٍ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ
translation: an Arabic Quran, free from any distortion- so that people may be mindful.

arabic_text: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلًا رَّجُلًا فِيهِ شُرَكَآءُ مُتَشَـٰكِسُونَ وَرَجُلًا سَلَمًا لِّرَجُلٍ هَلْ يَسْتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًا ۚ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
translation: God puts forward this illustration: can a man who has for his masters several partners at odds with each other be considered equal to a man devoted wholly to one master? All praise belongs to God, though most of them do not know.

arabic_text: إِنَّكَ مَيِّتٌ وَإِنَّهُم مَّيِّتُونَ
translation: You [Prophet] will certainly die, and so will they,

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمْ تَخْتَصِمُونَ
translation: and, on the Day of Resurrection, you will dispute with one another in the presence of your Lord.

arabic_text: ۞ فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَبَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ إِذْ جَآءَهُۥٓ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًى لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
translation: So who could be more wrong than the person who invents a lie about God and rejects the truth when it comes to him? Is there not ample punishment for the disbelievers in Hell?

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِى جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ ۙ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ
translation: It is the one who brings the truth and the one who accepts it as true who are mindful of God:

arabic_text: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
translation: they will have everything they wish for with their Lord. Such is the reward of those who do good:

arabic_text: لِيُكَفِّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ أَسْوَأَ ٱلَّذِى عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَجْزِيَهُمْ أَجْرَهُم بِأَحْسَنِ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
translation: God will absolve them even of their worst deeds and will reward them according to their best.

arabic_text: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِكَافٍ عَبْدَهُۥ ۖ وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ بِٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍ
translation: Is God not enough for His servant? Yet they threaten you [Prophet] with those they worship other than Him. If God allows someone to stray he has no one to guide him;

arabic_text: وَمَن يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّضِلٍّ ۗ أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِعَزِيزٍ ذِى ٱنتِقَامٍ
translation: if God guides someone no one can lead him astray. Is God not mighty and capable of retribution?

arabic_text: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُ ۚ قُلْ أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِنْ أَرَادَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ هَلْ هُنَّ كَـٰشِفَـٰتُ ضُرِّهِۦٓ أَوْ أَرَادَنِى بِرَحْمَةٍ هَلْ هُنَّ مُمْسِكَـٰتُ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ حَسْبِىَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ عَلَيْهِ يَتَوَكَّلُ ٱلْمُتَوَكِّلُونَ
translation: If you [Prophet] ask them, ‘Who created the heavens and earth?’ they are sure to answer, ‘God,’ so say, ‘Consider those you invoke beside Him: if God wished to harm me, could they undo that harm? If God wished to show me mercy, could they withhold that mercy?’ Say, ‘God is enough for me: all those who trust should put their trust in Him.’

arabic_text: قُلْ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنِّى عَـٰمِلٌ ۖ فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
translation: Say, ‘My people, do whatever is in your power- and so will I. You will find out

arabic_text: مَن يَأْتِيهِ عَذَابٌ يُخْزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيْهِ عَذَابٌ مُّقِيمٌ
translation: who will suffer humiliation, and on whom a lasting torment will descend.’

arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لِلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ فَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيْهَا ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِوَكِيلٍ
translation: We have sent the Scripture down to you [Prophet] with the Truth for people. Whoever follows the guidance does so for his own benefit, whoever strays away from it does so at his own peril: you are not in charge of them.

arabic_text: ٱللَّهُ يَتَوَفَّى ٱلْأَنفُسَ حِينَ مَوْتِهَا وَٱلَّتِى لَمْ تَمُتْ فِى مَنَامِهَا ۖ فَيُمْسِكُ ٱلَّتِى قَضَىٰ عَلَيْهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ وَيُرْسِلُ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
translation: God takes the souls of the dead and the souls of the living while they sleep- He keeps hold of those whose death He has ordained and sends the others back until their appointed time- there truly are signs in this for those who reflect.

arabic_text: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَ ۚ قُلْ أَوَلَوْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
translation: Yet they take intercessors besides God! Say, ‘Even though these have no power or understanding?’

arabic_text: قُل لِّلَّهِ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةُ جَمِيعًا ۖ لَّهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
translation: Say, ‘All intercession belongs to God alone; He holds control of the heavens and the earth; in the end you will all return to Him.’

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ ٱشْمَأَزَّتْ قُلُوبُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۖ وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِذَا هُمْ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ
translation: Whenever God is mentioned on His own, the hearts of those who do not believe in the Hereafter shrink with aversion, but they rejoice when gods other than Him are mentioned.

arabic_text: قُلِ ٱللَّهُمَّ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ عَـٰلِمَ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ أَنتَ تَحْكُمُ بَيْنَ عِبَادِكَ فِى مَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
translation: Say, ‘God! Creator of the heavens and earth! Knower of all that is hidden and all that is open, You will judge between Your servants regarding their differences.’

arabic_text: وَلَوْ أَنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا وَمِثْلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لَٱفْتَدَوْا۟ بِهِۦ مِن سُوٓءِ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ وَبَدَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يَكُونُوا۟ يَحْتَسِبُونَ
translation: If the evildoers possessed the earth’s assets twice over they would offer them to ransom themselves from the terrible suffering on the Day of Resurrection: God will show them something they had not reckoned with,

arabic_text: وَبَدَا لَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
translation: the evil of their deeds will become plain to them, and they will be overwhelmed by that at which they used to laugh.

arabic_text: فَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ ضُرٌّ دَعَانَا ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلْنَـٰهُ نِعْمَةً مِّنَّا قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أُوتِيتُهُۥ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍۭ ۚ بَلْ هِىَ فِتْنَةٌ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
translation: When man suffers some affliction, he cries out to Us, but when We favour him with Our blessing, he says, ‘All this has been given to me because of my knowledge’- it is only a test, though most of them do not know it.

arabic_text: قَدْ قَالَهَا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
translation: Those who lived before them said the same. What they did was of no use to them;

arabic_text: فَأَصَابَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنْ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ سَيُصِيبُهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَمَا هُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ
translation: they suffered its evil effects. Today’s wrongdoers will also suffer the evil effects of their deeds: they will not escape.

arabic_text: أَوَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقْدِرُ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
translation: Do they not know that God provides abun-dantly for anyone He will and gives sparingly to anyone He will? There truly are signs in this for those who believe.

arabic_text: ۞ قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا۟ مِن رَّحْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَغْفِرُ ٱلذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
translation: Say, ‘[God says], My servants who have harmed yourselves by your own excess, do not despair of God’s mercy. God forgives all sins: He is truly the Most Forgiving, the Most Merciful.

arabic_text: وَأَنِيبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ وَأَسْلِمُوا۟ لَهُۥ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ
translation: Turn to your Lord. Submit to Him before the punishment overtakes you and you can no longer be helped.

arabic_text: وَٱتَّبِعُوٓا۟ أَحْسَنَ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُم مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ بَغْتَةً وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ
translation: Follow the best teaching sent down to you from your Lord, before the punishment suddenly takes you, unawares,

arabic_text: أَن تَقُولَ نَفْسٌ يَـٰحَسْرَتَىٰ عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطتُ فِى جَنۢبِ ٱللَّهِ وَإِن كُنتُ لَمِنَ ٱلسَّـٰخِرِينَ
translation: and your soul says, “Woe is me for having neglected what is due to God, and having been one of those who scoffed!”

arabic_text: أَوْ تَقُولَ لَوْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
translation: Or it says, “If God had guided me, I would have joined the righteous!”

arabic_text: أَوْ تَقُولَ حِينَ تَرَى ٱلْعَذَابَ لَوْ أَنَّ لِى كَرَّةً فَأَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
translation: Or, faced by punishment, it says, “If only I could have another chance, I would join those who do good!”

arabic_text: بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَتْكَ ءَايَـٰتِى فَكَذَّبْتَ بِهَا وَٱسْتَكْبَرْتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
translation: No indeed! My messages came to you and you rejected them: you were arrogant and rejected the truth.’

arabic_text: وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ تَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وُجُوهُهُم مُّسْوَدَّةٌ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًى لِّلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
translation: On the Day of Resurrection, you [Prophet] will see those who told lies against God, their faces darkened. Is there not ample punishment for the arrogant in Hell?

arabic_text: وَيُنَجِّى ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ بِمَفَازَتِهِمْ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلسُّوٓءُ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
translation: But God will deliver those who took heed of Him to their place of safety: no harm will touch them, nor will they grieve.

arabic_text: ٱللَّهُ خَـٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَكِيلٌ
translation: God is the Creator of all things; He has charge of everything;

arabic_text: لَّهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
translation: the keys of the heavens and earth are His. Those who have rejected the revelations of God will be the losers.

arabic_text: قُلْ أَفَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ تَأْمُرُوٓنِّىٓ أَعْبُدُ أَيُّهَا ٱلْجَـٰهِلُونَ
translation: Say, ‘Do you order me to worship someone other than God, you foolish people?’

arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكَ لَئِنْ أَشْرَكْتَ لَيَحْبَطَنَّ عَمَلُكَ وَلَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ
translation: It has already been revealed to you [Prophet] and to those before you: ‘If you ascribe any partner to God, all your work will come to nothing: you will be one if the losers.

arabic_text: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعْبُدْ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
translation: No! Worship God alone and be one of those who are grateful to Him.’

arabic_text: وَمَا قَدَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهِۦ وَٱلْأَرْضُ جَمِيعًا قَبْضَتُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ مَطْوِيَّـٰتٌۢ بِيَمِينِهِۦ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
translation: These people have no grasp of God’s true measure. On the Day of Resurrection, the whole earth will be in His grip. The heavens will be rolled up in His right hand- Glory be to Him! He is far above the partners they ascribe to Him!-

arabic_text: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَصَعِقَ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ ثُمَّ نُفِخَ فِيهِ أُخْرَىٰ فَإِذَا هُمْ قِيَامٌ يَنظُرُونَ
translation: the Trumpet will be sounded, and everyone in the heavens and earth will fall down senseless except those God spares. It will be sounded once again and they will be on their feet, looking on.

arabic_text: وَأَشْرَقَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ بِنُورِ رَبِّهَا وَوُضِعَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ وَجِا۟ىٓءَ بِٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءِ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
translation: The earth will shine with the light of its Lord; the Record of Deeds will be laid open; the prophets and witnesses will be brought in. Fair judgement will be given between them: they will not be wronged

arabic_text: وَوُفِّيَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّا عَمِلَتْ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَفْعَلُونَ
translation: and every soul will be repaid in full for what it has done. He knows best what they do.

arabic_text: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ زُمَرًا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا فُتِحَتْ أَبْوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ رُسُلٌ مِّنكُمْ يَتْلُونَ عَلَيْكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّكُمْ وَيُنذِرُونَكُمْ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هَـٰذَا ۚ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ وَلَـٰكِنْ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
translation: Those who rejected the Truth will be led to Hell in their throngs. When they arrive, its gates will open and its keepers will say to them, ‘Were you not sent your own messengers to recite the revelations of your Lord to you and warn you that you would meet this Day?’ and they will say, ‘Yes indeed we were.’ But the sentence of punishment will have been passed against those who rejected the truth.

arabic_text: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلُوٓا۟ أَبْوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ مَثْوَى ٱلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
translation: It will be said, ‘Enter the gates of Hell: there you will remain. How evil is the abode of the arrogant!’

arabic_text: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْجَنَّةِ زُمَرًا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا وَفُتِحَتْ أَبْوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَا سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ طِبْتُمْ فَٱدْخُلُوهَا خَـٰلِدِينَ
translation: Those who were mindful of their Lord will be led in throngs to the Garden. When they arrive, they will find its gates wide open, and its keepers will say to them, ‘Peace be upon you. You have been good. Come in: you are here to stay,’

arabic_text: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى صَدَقَنَا وَعْدَهُۥ وَأَوْرَثَنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ نَتَبَوَّأُ مِنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ حَيْثُ نَشَآءُ ۖ فَنِعْمَ أَجْرُ ٱلْعَـٰمِلِينَ
translation: and they will say, ‘Praise be to God who has kept His promise to us and given us this land as our own. Now we may live wherever we please in the Garden.’ How excellent is the reward of those who labour!

arabic_text: وَتَرَى ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ حَآفِّينَ مِنْ حَوْلِ ٱلْعَرْشِ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ ۖ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَقِيلَ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
translation: You [Prophet] will see the angels surrounding the Throne, glorifying their Lord with praise. True judgement will have been passed between them, and it will be said, ‘Praise be to God, the Lord of the Worlds.’

arabic_text: حمٓ
translation: Ha Mim

arabic_text: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ
translation: This Scripture is sent down from God, the Almighty, the All Knowing,

arabic_text: غَافِرِ ٱلذَّنۢبِ وَقَابِلِ ٱلتَّوْبِ شَدِيدِ ٱلْعِقَابِ ذِى ٱلطَّوْلِ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ إِلَيْهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
translation: Forgiver of sins and Accepter of repentance, severe in punishment, infinite in bounty. There is no god but Him; to Him is the ultimate return.

arabic_text: مَا يُجَـٰدِلُ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَلَا يَغْرُرْكَ تَقَلُّبُهُمْ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ
translation: It is only the disbelievers who dispute God’s revelations. [Prophet], do not be dazzled by their movements back and forth across the land.

arabic_text: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَٱلْأَحْزَابُ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ ۖ وَهَمَّتْ كُلُّ أُمَّةٍۭ بِرَسُولِهِمْ لِيَأْخُذُوهُ ۖ وَجَـٰدَلُوا۟ بِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ لِيُدْحِضُوا۟ بِهِ ٱلْحَقَّ فَأَخَذْتُهُمْ ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عِقَابِ
translation: Before them the people of Noah rejected the truth and so did those who formed opposition after them: every community schemed to destroy its messenger and strove to refute truth with falsehood; but it was I who destroyed them. How terrible My punishment was!

arabic_text: وَكَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ
translation: In this way your Lord’s sentence was passed against the disbelievers that they would be the inhabitants of the Fire.

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَحْمِلُونَ ٱلْعَرْشَ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهُۥ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ وَيُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَيَسْتَغْفِرُونَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ رَبَّنَا وَسِعْتَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ رَّحْمَةً وَعِلْمًا فَٱغْفِرْ لِلَّذِينَ تَابُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ سَبِيلَكَ وَقِهِمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
translation: Those [angels] who carry the Throne and those who surround it celebrate the praise of their Lord and have faith in Him. They beg forgiveness for the believers: ‘Our Lord, You embrace all things in mercy and knowledge, so forgive those who turn to You and follow Your path. Save them from the pains of Hell

arabic_text: رَبَّنَا وَأَدْخِلْهُمْ جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ ٱلَّتِى وَعَدتَّهُمْ وَمَن صَلَحَ مِنْ ءَابَآئِهِمْ وَأَزْوَٰجِهِمْ وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
translation: and admit them, Lord, to the lasting Gardens You have promised to them, together with their righteous ancestors, spouses, and offspring: You alone are the Almighty, the All Wise.

arabic_text: وَقِهِمُ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ ۚ وَمَن تَقِ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ يَوْمَئِذٍ فَقَدْ رَحِمْتَهُۥ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
translation: Protect them from all evil deeds: those You protect on that Day from [the punishment for] evil deeds will receive Your mercy- that is the supreme triumph.’

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُنَادَوْنَ لَمَقْتُ ٱللَّهِ أَكْبَرُ مِن مَّقْتِكُمْ أَنفُسَكُمْ إِذْ تُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ فَتَكْفُرُونَ
translation: But those who disbelieved will be told, ‘When you were called to the faith and rejected it, God’s disgust with you was even greater then than the self-disgust you feel [today].’

arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَآ أَمَتَّنَا ٱثْنَتَيْنِ وَأَحْيَيْتَنَا ٱثْنَتَيْنِ فَٱعْتَرَفْنَا بِذُنُوبِنَا فَهَلْ إِلَىٰ خُرُوجٍ مِّن سَبِيلٍ
translation: They will say, ‘Our Lord, twice You have caused us to be lifeless and twice You have brought us to life. Now we recognize our sins. Is there any way out?’

arabic_text: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّهُۥٓ إِذَا دُعِىَ ٱللَّهُ وَحْدَهُۥ كَفَرْتُمْ ۖ وَإِن يُشْرَكْ بِهِۦ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ ۚ فَٱلْحُكْمُ لِلَّهِ ٱلْعَلِىِّ ٱلْكَبِيرِ
translation: [They will be told], ‘This is all because when God alone was invoked you rejected this, yet when others were associated with Him you believed [in them].’ Judgement belongs to God the Most High, the Most Great.

arabic_text: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُرِيكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَيُنَزِّلُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزْقًا ۚ وَمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ إِلَّا مَن يُنِيبُ
translation: It is He who shows you [people] His signs and sends water down from the sky to sustain you, though only those who turn to God will take heed.

arabic_text: فَٱدْعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
translation: So call upon God and dedicate your religion to Him alone, however hateful this may be to the disbelievers:

arabic_text: رَفِيعُ ٱلدَّرَجَـٰتِ ذُو ٱلْعَرْشِ يُلْقِى ٱلرُّوحَ مِنْ أَمْرِهِۦ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ لِيُنذِرَ يَوْمَ ٱلتَّلَاقِ
translation: He is exalted in rank, the Lord of the Throne. He sends revelations with His teachings to whichever of His servants He will, in order to warn of the Day of Meeting,

arabic_text: يَوْمَ هُم بَـٰرِزُونَ ۖ لَا يَخْفَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مِنْهُمْ شَىْءٌ ۚ لِّمَنِ ٱلْمُلْكُ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۖ لِلَّهِ ٱلْوَٰحِدِ ٱلْقَهَّارِ
translation: the Day when they will come out and nothing about them will be concealed from God. ‘Who has control today?’ ‘God, the One, the All Powerful.

arabic_text: ٱلْيَوْمَ تُجْزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ ۚ لَا ظُلْمَ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلْحِسَابِ
translation: Today each soul will be rewarded for whatever it has done; today no injustice will be done. God is swift in reckoning.’

arabic_text: وَأَنذِرْهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْـَٔازِفَةِ إِذِ ٱلْقُلُوبُ لَدَى ٱلْحَنَاجِرِ كَـٰظِمِينَ ۚ مَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِنْ حَمِيمٍ وَلَا شَفِيعٍ يُطَاعُ
translation: Warn them [Prophet] of the ever-approaching Day, when hearts are at throats, choking them. The evildoer will have no friends, nor any intercessor to be heeded.

arabic_text: يَعْلَمُ خَآئِنَةَ ٱلْأَعْيُنِ وَمَا تُخْفِى ٱلصُّدُورُ
translation: God is aware of the most furtive of glances, and of all that hearts conceal:

arabic_text: وَٱللَّهُ يَقْضِى بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ لَا يَقْضُونَ بِشَىْءٍ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْبَصِيرُ
translation: God will judge with truth, while those they invoke besides Him will not judge at all. God is the All Hearing, the All Seeing.

arabic_text: ۞ أَوَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُوا۟ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ كَانُوا۟ هُمْ أَشَدَّ مِنْهُمْ قُوَّةً وَءَاثَارًا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمْ وَمَا كَانَ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَاقٍ
translation: Have they not travelled through the land and seen how those who lived before them met their end? They were stronger than them and made a more impressive mark on the land, yet God destroyed them for their sins- they had no one to defend them against Him-

arabic_text: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَانَت تَّأْتِيهِمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ فَكَفَرُوا۟ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ قَوِىٌّ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
translation: because messengers repeatedly came to them with clear signs and still they rejected them. God destroyed them: He is truly full of strength, severe in punishment.

arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
translation: We sent Moses with Our signs and clear authority

arabic_text: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَهَـٰمَـٰنَ وَقَـٰرُونَ فَقَالُوا۟ سَـٰحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ
translation: to Pharaoh, Haman, and Korah and they said, ‘Sorcerer! Liar!’

arabic_text: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ مِنْ عِندِنَا قَالُوا۟ ٱقْتُلُوٓا۟ أَبْنَآءَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ وَٱسْتَحْيُوا۟ نِسَآءَهُمْ ۚ وَمَا كَيْدُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ
translation: When he brought the truth to them from Us, they said, ‘Kill the sons of those who believe with him; spare only their women’- the scheming of those who reject the truth can only go wrong-

arabic_text: وَقَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ ذَرُونِىٓ أَقْتُلْ مُوسَىٰ وَلْيَدْعُ رَبَّهُۥٓ ۖ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُبَدِّلَ دِينَكُمْ أَوْ أَن يُظْهِرَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلْفَسَادَ
translation: and Pharaoh said, ‘Leave me to kill Moses- let him call upon his Lord!- for I fear he may cause you to change your religion, or spread disorder in the land.’
