arabic_text: مَثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ حُمِّلُوا۟ ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةَ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَحْمِلُوهَا كَمَثَلِ ٱلْحِمَارِ يَحْمِلُ أَسْفَارًۢا ۚ بِئْسَ مَثَلُ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
translation: Those who have been charged to obey the Torah, but do not do so, are like asses carrying books: how base such people are who disobey God’s revelations! God does not guide people who do wrong.

arabic_text: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوٓا۟ إِن زَعَمْتُمْ أَنَّكُمْ أَوْلِيَآءُ لِلَّهِ مِن دُونِ ٱلنَّاسِ فَتَمَنَّوُا۟ ٱلْمَوْتَ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
translation: Say [Prophet], ‘You who follow the Jewish faith, if you truly claim that out of all people you alone are friends of God, then you should be hoping for death.’

arabic_text: وَلَا يَتَمَنَّوْنَهُۥٓ أَبَدًۢا بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
translation: But because of what they have stored up for themselves with their own hands they would never hope for death––God knows the wrongdoers very well––

arabic_text: قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْمَوْتَ ٱلَّذِى تَفِرُّونَ مِنْهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ مُلَـٰقِيكُمْ ۖ ثُمَّ تُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
translation: so say, ‘The death you run away from will come to meet you and you will be returned to the One who knows the unseen as well as the seen: He will tell you everything you have done.’

arabic_text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا نُودِىَ لِلصَّلَوٰةِ مِن يَوْمِ ٱلْجُمُعَةِ فَٱسْعَوْا۟ إِلَىٰ ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ وَذَرُوا۟ ٱلْبَيْعَ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
translation: Believers! When the call to prayer is made on the day of congregation, hurry towards the reminder of God and leave off your trading––that is better for you, if only you knew––

arabic_text: فَإِذَا قُضِيَتِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةُ فَٱنتَشِرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱبْتَغُوا۟ مِن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
translation: then when the prayer has ended, disperse in the land and seek out God’s bounty. Remember God often so that you may prosper.

arabic_text: وَإِذَا رَأَوْا۟ تِجَـٰرَةً أَوْ لَهْوًا ٱنفَضُّوٓا۟ إِلَيْهَا وَتَرَكُوكَ قَآئِمًا ۚ قُلْ مَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيْرٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّهْوِ وَمِنَ ٱلتِّجَـٰرَةِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
translation: Yet they scatter towards trade or entertainment whenever they observe it, and leave you [Prophet] standing there. Say, ‘God’s gift is better than any entertainment or trade: God is the best provider.’

arabic_text: إِذَا جَآءَكَ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقُونَ قَالُوا۟ نَشْهَدُ إِنَّكَ لَرَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ إِنَّكَ لَرَسُولُهُۥ وَٱللَّهُ يَشْهَدُ إِنَّ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
translation: When the hypocrites come to you [Prophet], they say, ‘We bear witness that you are the Messenger of God.’ God knows that you truly are His Messenger and He bears witness that the hypocrites are liars––

arabic_text: ٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ أَيْمَـٰنَهُمْ جُنَّةً فَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ سَآءَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
translation: they use their oaths as a cover and so bar others from God’s way: what they have been doing is truly evil––

arabic_text: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ ءَامَنُوا۟ ثُمَّ كَفَرُوا۟ فَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يَفْقَهُونَ
translation: because they professed faith and then rejected it, so their hearts have been sealed and they do not understand.

arabic_text: ۞ وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ تُعْجِبُكَ أَجْسَامُهُمْ ۖ وَإِن يَقُولُوا۟ تَسْمَعْ لِقَوْلِهِمْ ۖ كَأَنَّهُمْ خُشُبٌ مُّسَنَّدَةٌ ۖ يَحْسَبُونَ كُلَّ صَيْحَةٍ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ هُمُ ٱلْعَدُوُّ فَٱحْذَرْهُمْ ۚ قَـٰتَلَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ أَنَّىٰ يُؤْفَكُونَ
translation: When you see them [Prophet], their outward appearance pleases you; when they speak, you listen to what they say. But they are like propped-up tim-bers––they think every cry they hear is against them––and they are the enemy. Beware of them. May God confound them! How devious they are!

arabic_text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَعَالَوْا۟ يَسْتَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ لَوَّوْا۟ رُءُوسَهُمْ وَرَأَيْتَهُمْ يَصُدُّونَ وَهُم مُّسْتَكْبِرُونَ
translation: They turn their heads away in disdain when they are told, ‘Come, so that the Messenger of God may ask forgiveness for you,’ and you see them walking away arrogantly.

arabic_text: سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ أَسْتَغْفَرْتَ لَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تَسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ لَن يَغْفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
translation: It makes no difference whether you ask forgiveness for them or not, God will not forgive them: God does not guide such treacherous people.

arabic_text: هُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ لَا تُنفِقُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَنْ عِندَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ حَتَّىٰ يَنفَضُّوا۟ ۗ وَلِلَّهِ خَزَآئِنُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ لَا يَفْقَهُونَ
translation: They are the ones who say, ‘Give nothing to those who follow God’s Messenger, until they abandon him’, but to God belong the treasures of the heavens and earth, though the hypocrites do not understand this.

arabic_text: يَقُولُونَ لَئِن رَّجَعْنَآ إِلَى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ لَيُخْرِجَنَّ ٱلْأَعَزُّ مِنْهَا ٱلْأَذَلَّ ۚ وَلِلَّهِ ٱلْعِزَّةُ وَلِرَسُولِهِۦ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
translation: They say, ‘Once we return to Medina the powerful will drive out the weak,’ but power belongs to God, to His Messenger, and to the believers, though the hypocrites do not know this.

arabic_text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تُلْهِكُمْ أَمْوَٰلُكُمْ وَلَآ أَوْلَـٰدُكُمْ عَن ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
translation: Believers, do not let your wealth and your children distract you from remembering God: those who do so will be the ones who lose.

arabic_text: وَأَنفِقُوا۟ مِن مَّا رَزَقْنَـٰكُم مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِىَ أَحَدَكُمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ فَيَقُولَ رَبِّ لَوْلَآ أَخَّرْتَنِىٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ قَرِيبٍ فَأَصَّدَّقَ وَأَكُن مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
translation: Give out of what We have provided for you, before death comes to one of you and he says, ‘My Lord, if You would only reprieve me for a little while, I would give in charity and become one of the righteous.’

arabic_text: وَلَن يُؤَخِّرَ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهَا ۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
translation: God does not reprieve a soul when its turn comes: God is fully aware of what you do.

arabic_text: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ ٱلْحَمْدُ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
translation: Everything that is in the heavens and earth glorifies God; all control and all praise belong to Him; He has power over everything.

arabic_text: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُمْ فَمِنكُمْ كَافِرٌ وَمِنكُم مُّؤْمِنٌ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
translation: It is He who created you, yet some of you disbelieve and some believe: God sees everything you do.

arabic_text: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَصَوَّرَكُمْ فَأَحْسَنَ صُوَرَكُمْ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
translation: He created the heavens and earth for a true purpose; He formed you and made your forms good: you will all return to Him.

arabic_text: يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
translation: He knows what is in the heavens and earth; He knows what you conceal and what you reveal; God knows very well the secrets of every heart.

arabic_text: أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَبْلُ فَذَاقُوا۟ وَبَالَ أَمْرِهِمْ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
translation: [Disbelievers], have you not heard about those who disbelieved before you? They tasted the evil consequences of their conduct, and a painful torment awaits them.

arabic_text: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُۥ كَانَت تَّأْتِيهِمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَبَشَرٌ يَهْدُونَنَا فَكَفَرُوا۟ وَتَوَلَّوا۟ ۚ وَّٱسْتَغْنَى ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَنِىٌّ حَمِيدٌ
translation: That is because their messengers came to them with clear signs, yet they said, ‘Should we take guidance from mere mortals?’, rejected the message, and turned away. But God had no need for them: He is all sufficient, worthy of all praise.

arabic_text: زَعَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَن لَّن يُبْعَثُوا۟ ۚ قُلْ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّى لَتُبْعَثُنَّ ثُمَّ لَتُنَبَّؤُنَّ بِمَا عَمِلْتُمْ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ
translation: The disbelievers claim they will not be raised from the dead. Say [Prophet], ‘Yes indeed! I swear by my Lord! You will be raised and then you will be informed about everything you have done: an easy matter for God.’

arabic_text: فَـَٔامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَٱلنُّورِ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلْنَا ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
translation: So believe in God, in His Messenger, and in the light We have sent down: God is fully aware of what you do.

arabic_text: يَوْمَ يَجْمَعُكُمْ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْجَمْعِ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلتَّغَابُنِ ۗ وَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ وَيَعْمَلْ صَـٰلِحًا يُكَفِّرْ عَنْهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِۦ وَيُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
translation: When He gathers you for the Day of Gathering, the Day of mutual neglect, He will cancel the sins of those who believed in Him and acted righteously: He will admit them into Gardens graced with flowing streams, there to remain for ever- the supreme triumph.

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
translation: But those who disbelieved and rejected Our signs will be the inhabitants of the Fire, there to remain- a miserable destination.

arabic_text: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ يَهْدِ قَلْبَهُۥ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
translation: Misfortunes can only happen with God’s permission––He will guide the heart of anyone who believes in Him: God knows all things––

arabic_text: وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ ۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
translation: so obey God and the Messenger. If you turn away, remember that Our Messenger’s duty is only to make plain his message.

arabic_text: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
translation: God! There is no god but Him, so let the faithful put their trust in Him.

arabic_text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّ مِنْ أَزْوَٰجِكُمْ وَأَوْلَـٰدِكُمْ عَدُوًّا لَّكُمْ فَٱحْذَرُوهُمْ ۚ وَإِن تَعْفُوا۟ وَتَصْفَحُوا۟ وَتَغْفِرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
translation: Believers, even among your spouses and your children you have some enemies- beware of them- but if you overlook their offences, forgive them, pardon them, then God is all forgiving, all merciful.

arabic_text: إِنَّمَآ أَمْوَٰلُكُمْ وَأَوْلَـٰدُكُمْ فِتْنَةٌ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
translation: Your wealth and your children are only a test for you. There is great reward with God:

arabic_text: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا ٱسْتَطَعْتُمْ وَٱسْمَعُوا۟ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ وَأَنفِقُوا۟ خَيْرًا لِّأَنفُسِكُمْ ۗ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفْسِهِۦ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
translation: be mindful of God as much as you can; hear and obey; be charitable- it is for your own good. Those who are saved from their own meanness will be the prosperous ones:

arabic_text: إِن تُقْرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا يُضَـٰعِفْهُ لَكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ شَكُورٌ حَلِيمٌ
translation: if you make a generous loan to God He will multiply it for you and forgive you. God is ever thankful and forbearing;

arabic_text: عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
translation: He knows the unseen, as well as the seen; He is the Almighty, the Wise.

arabic_text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ إِذَا طَلَّقْتُمُ ٱلنِّسَآءَ فَطَلِّقُوهُنَّ لِعِدَّتِهِنَّ وَأَحْصُوا۟ ٱلْعِدَّةَ ۖ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ ۖ لَا تُخْرِجُوهُنَّ مِنۢ بُيُوتِهِنَّ وَلَا يَخْرُجْنَ إِلَّآ أَن يَأْتِينَ بِفَـٰحِشَةٍ مُّبَيِّنَةٍ ۚ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ ٱللَّهِ فَقَدْ ظَلَمَ نَفْسَهُۥ ۚ لَا تَدْرِى لَعَلَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحْدِثُ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ أَمْرًا
translation: Prophet, when any of you intend to divorce women, do so at a time when their prescribed waiting period can properly start, and calculate the period carefully: be mindful of God, your Lord. Do not drive them out of their homes––nor should they themselves leave––unless they commit a flagrant indecency. These are the limits set by God–– whoever oversteps God’s limits wrongs his own soul––for you cannot know what new situation God may perhaps bring about.

arabic_text: فَإِذَا بَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَأَمْسِكُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ فَارِقُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ وَأَشْهِدُوا۟ ذَوَىْ عَدْلٍ مِّنكُمْ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلشَّهَـٰدَةَ لِلَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ يُوعَظُ بِهِۦ مَن كَانَ يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مَخْرَجًا
translation: When they have completed their appointed term, either keep them honourably, or part with them honourably. Call two just witnesses from your people and establish witness for the sake of God. Anyone who believes in God and the Last Day should heed this: God will find a way out for those who are mindful of Him,

arabic_text: وَيَرْزُقْهُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَحْتَسِبُ ۚ وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُۥٓ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَـٰلِغُ أَمْرِهِۦ ۚ قَدْ جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ لِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدْرًا
translation: and will provide for them from an unexpected source; God will be enough for those who put their trust in Him. God achieves His purpose; God has set a due measure for everything.

arabic_text: وَٱلَّـٰٓـِٔى يَئِسْنَ مِنَ ٱلْمَحِيضِ مِن نِّسَآئِكُمْ إِنِ ٱرْتَبْتُمْ فَعِدَّتُهُنَّ ثَلَـٰثَةُ أَشْهُرٍ وَٱلَّـٰٓـِٔى لَمْ يَحِضْنَ ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰتُ ٱلْأَحْمَالِ أَجَلُهُنَّ أَن يَضَعْنَ حَمْلَهُنَّ ۚ وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مِنْ أَمْرِهِۦ يُسْرًا
translation: If you are in doubt, the period of waiting will be three months for those women who have ceased menstruating and for those who have not [yet] menstruated; the waiting period of those who are pregnant will be until they deliver their burden: God makes things easy for those who are mindful of Him.

arabic_text: ذَٰلِكَ أَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ أَنزَلَهُۥٓ إِلَيْكُمْ ۚ وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يُكَفِّرْ عَنْهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِۦ وَيُعْظِمْ لَهُۥٓ أَجْرًا
translation: This is God’s command, which He has sent down to you. God will wipe out the sinful deeds and increase the rewards of anyone who is mindful of Him.

arabic_text: أَسْكِنُوهُنَّ مِنْ حَيْثُ سَكَنتُم مِّن وُجْدِكُمْ وَلَا تُضَآرُّوهُنَّ لِتُضَيِّقُوا۟ عَلَيْهِنَّ ۚ وَإِن كُنَّ أُو۟لَـٰتِ حَمْلٍ فَأَنفِقُوا۟ عَلَيْهِنَّ حَتَّىٰ يَضَعْنَ حَمْلَهُنَّ ۚ فَإِنْ أَرْضَعْنَ لَكُمْ فَـَٔاتُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ ۖ وَأْتَمِرُوا۟ بَيْنَكُم بِمَعْرُوفٍ ۖ وَإِن تَعَاسَرْتُمْ فَسَتُرْضِعُ لَهُۥٓ أُخْرَىٰ
translation: House the wives you are divorcing according to your means, wherever you house yourselves, and do not harass them so as to make their lives difficult. If they are pregnant, maintain them until they are delivered of their burdens; if they suckle your infants, pay them for it. Consult together in a good way- if you make difficulties for one another, another woman may suckle the child for the father––

arabic_text: لِيُنفِقْ ذُو سَعَةٍ مِّن سَعَتِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن قُدِرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقُهُۥ فَلْيُنفِقْ مِمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ ۚ لَا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا مَآ ءَاتَىٰهَا ۚ سَيَجْعَلُ ٱللَّهُ بَعْدَ عُسْرٍ يُسْرًا
translation: and let the wealthy man spend according to his wealth. But let him whose provision is restricted spend according to what God has given him: God does not burden any soul with more than He has given it- after hardship, God will bring ease.

arabic_text: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرْيَةٍ عَتَتْ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهَا وَرُسُلِهِۦ فَحَاسَبْنَـٰهَا حِسَابًا شَدِيدًا وَعَذَّبْنَـٰهَا عَذَابًا نُّكْرًا
translation: Many a town that insolently opposed the command of its Lord and His messengers We have brought sternly to account: We punished them severely

arabic_text: فَذَاقَتْ وَبَالَ أَمْرِهَا وَكَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ أَمْرِهَا خُسْرًا
translation: to make them taste the ill effect of their conduct- the result of their conduct was ruin.

arabic_text: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا ۖ فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ يَـٰٓأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ۚ قَدْ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيْكُمْ ذِكْرًا
translation: God has prepared a severe torment for them. So, you who have understanding, you who believe, beware of God. He has sent you the Quran

arabic_text: رَّسُولًا يَتْلُوا۟ عَلَيْكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ مُبَيِّنَـٰتٍ لِّيُخْرِجَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ مِنَ ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِ ۚ وَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ وَيَعْمَلْ صَـٰلِحًا يُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۖ قَدْ أَحْسَنَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُۥ رِزْقًا
translation: and a messenger- reciting to you God’s revelations that make things clear- to bring those who believe and do righteous deeds from darkness into light. God will admit those who believe in Him and do righteous deeds into Gardens graced with flowing streams, where they will remain for ever––He has made good provision for them.

arabic_text: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍ وَمِنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ مِثْلَهُنَّ يَتَنَزَّلُ ٱلْأَمْرُ بَيْنَهُنَّ لِتَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدْ أَحَاطَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عِلْمًۢا
translation: It is God who created seven heavens and a similar [number] of earths. His command descends throughout them. So you should realize that He has power over all things and that His knowledge encompasses everything.

arabic_text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ لِمَ تُحَرِّمُ مَآ أَحَلَّ ٱللَّهُ لَكَ ۖ تَبْتَغِى مَرْضَاتَ أَزْوَٰجِكَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
translation: Prophet, why do you prohibit what God has made lawful to you in your desire to please your wives? Yet God is forgiving and merciful:

arabic_text: قَدْ فَرَضَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ تَحِلَّةَ أَيْمَـٰنِكُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ مَوْلَىٰكُمْ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَلِيمُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
translation: He has ordained a way for you [believers] to release you from [such] oaths––God is your helper: He is the All Knowing, the Wise.

arabic_text: وَإِذْ أَسَرَّ ٱلنَّبِىُّ إِلَىٰ بَعْضِ أَزْوَٰجِهِۦ حَدِيثًا فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَتْ بِهِۦ وَأَظْهَرَهُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ عَرَّفَ بَعْضَهُۥ وَأَعْرَضَ عَنۢ بَعْضٍ ۖ فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَهَا بِهِۦ قَالَتْ مَنْ أَنۢبَأَكَ هَـٰذَا ۖ قَالَ نَبَّأَنِىَ ٱلْعَلِيمُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
translation: The Prophet told something in confidence to one of his wives. When she disclosed it [to another wife] and God made this known to him, he confirmed part of it, keeping the rest to himself. When he confronted her with what she had done, she asked, ‘Who told you about this?’ and he replied, ‘The All Knowing, the All Aware told me.’

arabic_text: إِن تَتُوبَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ فَقَدْ صَغَتْ قُلُوبُكُمَا ۖ وَإِن تَظَـٰهَرَا عَلَيْهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ مَوْلَىٰهُ وَجِبْرِيلُ وَصَـٰلِحُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ۖ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ ظَهِيرٌ
translation: If both of you [wives] repent to God––for your hearts have deviated––[all will be well]; if you collaborate against him, [be warned that] God will aid him, as will Gabriel and all righteous believers, and the angels too will back him.

arabic_text: عَسَىٰ رَبُّهُۥٓ إِن طَلَّقَكُنَّ أَن يُبْدِلَهُۥٓ أَزْوَٰجًا خَيْرًا مِّنكُنَّ مُسْلِمَـٰتٍ مُّؤْمِنَـٰتٍ قَـٰنِتَـٰتٍ تَـٰٓئِبَـٰتٍ عَـٰبِدَٰتٍ سَـٰٓئِحَـٰتٍ ثَيِّبَـٰتٍ وَأَبْكَارًا
translation: His Lord may well replace you with better wives if the Prophet decides to divorce any of you: wives who are devoted to God, true believers, devout, who turn to Him in repentance and worship Him, given to fasting, whether previously married or virgins.

arabic_text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ قُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمْ وَأَهْلِيكُمْ نَارًا وَقُودُهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلْحِجَارَةُ عَلَيْهَا مَلَـٰٓئِكَةٌ غِلَاظٌ شِدَادٌ لَّا يَعْصُونَ ٱللَّهَ مَآ أَمَرَهُمْ وَيَفْعَلُونَ مَا يُؤْمَرُونَ
translation: Believers, guard yourselves and your families against a Fire fuelled by people and stones, over which stand angels, stern and strong; angels who never disobey God’s commands to them, but do as they are ordered:

arabic_text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَا تَعْتَذِرُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
translation: ‘You who disbelieve, make no excuses today: you are only being repaid for what you used to do.’

arabic_text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ تُوبُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوْبَةً نَّصُوحًا عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمْ أَن يُكَفِّرَ عَنكُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمْ وَيُدْخِلَكُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ يَوْمَ لَا يُخْزِى ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّبِىَّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ ۖ نُورُهُمْ يَسْعَىٰ بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَبِأَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ أَتْمِمْ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَٱغْفِرْ لَنَآ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
translation: Believers, turn to God in sincere repentance. Your Lord may well cancel your bad deeds for you and admit you into Gardens graced with flowing streams, on a Day when God will not disgrace the Prophet or those who have believed with him. With their lights streaming out ahead of them and to their right, they will say, ‘Lord, perfect our lights for us and forgive us: You have power over everything.’

arabic_text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ جَـٰهِدِ ٱلْكُفَّارَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ وَٱغْلُظْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَمَأْوَىٰهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
translation: Prophet, strive hard against the disbelievers and the hypocrites. Deal with them sternly. Hell will be their home, an evil destination!

arabic_text: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلًا لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱمْرَأَتَ نُوحٍ وَٱمْرَأَتَ لُوطٍ ۖ كَانَتَا تَحْتَ عَبْدَيْنِ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا صَـٰلِحَيْنِ فَخَانَتَاهُمَا فَلَمْ يُغْنِيَا عَنْهُمَا مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًٔا وَقِيلَ ٱدْخُلَا ٱلنَّارَ مَعَ ٱلدَّٰخِلِينَ
translation: God has given examples of disbelievers: the wives of Noah and Lot who married two of Our righteous servants but betrayed them. Their husbands could not help them against God: it was said, ‘Both of you enter the Fire with the others.’

arabic_text: وَضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلًا لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱمْرَأَتَ فِرْعَوْنَ إِذْ قَالَتْ رَبِّ ٱبْنِ لِى عِندَكَ بَيْتًا فِى ٱلْجَنَّةِ وَنَجِّنِى مِن فِرْعَوْنَ وَعَمَلِهِۦ وَنَجِّنِى مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
translation: God has also given examples of believers: Pharaoh’s wife, who said, ‘Lord, build me a house near You in the Garden. Save me from Pharaoh and his actions; save me from the evildoers,’

arabic_text: وَمَرْيَمَ ٱبْنَتَ عِمْرَٰنَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَحْصَنَتْ فَرْجَهَا فَنَفَخْنَا فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِنَا وَصَدَّقَتْ بِكَلِمَـٰتِ رَبِّهَا وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَكَانَتْ مِنَ ٱلْقَـٰنِتِينَ
translation: and Mary, daughter of Imran. She guarded her chastity, so We breathed into her from Our spirit. She accepted the truth of her Lord’s words and Scriptures: she was truly devout.

arabic_text: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
translation: Exalted is He who holds all control in His hands; who has power over all things;

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْمَوْتَ وَٱلْحَيَوٰةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفُورُ
translation: who created death and life to test you [people] and reveal which of you does best––He is the Mighty, the Forgiving;

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا ۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِى خَلْقِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مِن تَفَـٰوُتٍ ۖ فَٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ هَلْ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورٍ
translation: who created the seven heavens, one above the other. You will not see any flaw in what the Lord of Mercy creates. Look again! Can you see any flaw?

arabic_text: ثُمَّ ٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيْنِ يَنقَلِبْ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْبَصَرُ خَاسِئًا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٌ
translation: Look again! And again! Your sight will turn back to you, weak and defeated.

arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِمَصَـٰبِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا رُجُومًا لِّلشَّيَـٰطِينِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
translation: We have adorned the lowest heaven with lamps and made them [missiles] for stoning devils for whom We have also prepared the torment of a blazing fire.

arabic_text: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِرَبِّهِمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
translation: For those who defy their Lord We have prepared the torment of Hell: an evil destination.

arabic_text: إِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ فِيهَا سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا شَهِيقًا وَهِىَ تَفُورُ
translation: They will hear it drawing in its breath when they are thrown in. It blazes forth,

arabic_text: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ ٱلْغَيْظِ ۖ كُلَّمَآ أُلْقِىَ فِيهَا فَوْجٌ سَأَلَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَذِيرٌ
translation: almost bursting with rage. Its keepers will ask every group that is thrown in, ‘Did no one come to warn you?’

arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٌ فَكَذَّبْنَا وَقُلْنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ كَبِيرٍ
translation: They will reply, ‘Yes, a warner did come to us, but we did not believe him. We said, “God has revealed nothing: you are greatly misguided”.’

arabic_text: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْ كُنَّا نَسْمَعُ أَوْ نَعْقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِىٓ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
translation: They will say, ‘If only we had listened, or reasoned, we would not be with the inhabitants of the blazing fire,’ and

arabic_text: فَٱعْتَرَفُوا۟ بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسُحْقًا لِّأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
translation: they will confess their sins. Away with the inhabitants of the blazing fire!

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَيْبِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
translation: But there is forgiveness and a great reward for those who fear their Lord though they cannot see Him.

arabic_text: وَأَسِرُّوا۟ قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ ٱجْهَرُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
translation: Whether you keep your words secret or state them openly, He knows the contents of every heart.

arabic_text: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
translation: How could He who created not know His own creation, when He is the Most Subtle, the All Aware?

arabic_text: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ ذَلُولًا فَٱمْشُوا۟ فِى مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُوا۟ مِن رِّزْقِهِۦ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ
translation: It is He who has made the earth manageable for you––travel its regions; eat His provision- and to Him you will be resurrected.

arabic_text: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَمُورُ
translation: Are you sure that He who is in Heaven will not make the earth swallow you up with a violent shudder?

arabic_text: أَمْ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذِيرِ
translation: Are you sure that He who is in Heaven will not send a whirlwind to pelt you with stones? You will come to know what My warning means.

arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
translation: Those who went before them also disbelieved- how terrible was My condemnation!

arabic_text: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٍ وَيَقْبِضْنَ ۚ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍۭ بَصِيرٌ
translation: Do they not see the birds above them spreading and closing their wings? It is only the Lord of Mercy who holds them up: He watches over everything.

arabic_text: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى هُوَ جُندٌ لَّكُمْ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ إِنِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِى غُرُورٍ
translation: What force can help you if the Lord of Mercy does not? The disbelievers are truly deluded.

arabic_text: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّجُّوا۟ فِى عُتُوٍّ وَنُفُورٍ
translation: Who can provide for you if He withholds His provision? Yet they persist in their insolence and their avoidance of the Truth.

arabic_text: أَفَمَن يَمْشِى مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦٓ أَهْدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمْشِى سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
translation: Who is better guided: someone who falls on his face, or someone who walks steadily on a straight path?

arabic_text: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۖ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
translation: Say [Prophet], ‘It is He who brought you into being, He who endowed you with hearing, sight, and understanding- what small thanks you give!’

arabic_text: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
translation: Say, ‘It is He who scattered you throughout the earth, He to whom you will be gathered.’

arabic_text: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
translation: They say, ‘If what you say is true, when will this promise be fulfilled?’

arabic_text: قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْعِلْمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
translation: Say, ‘God alone has knowledge of this: my only duty is to give clear warning.’

arabic_text: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَةً سِيٓـَٔتْ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَقِيلَ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ
translation: When they see it close at hand, the disbelievers’ faces will be gloomy, and it will be said, ‘This is what you were calling for.’

arabic_text: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِىَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
translation: Say, ‘Just think- regardless of whether God destroys me and my followers or has mercy on us- who will protect the disbelievers from an agonizing torment?’

arabic_text: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
translation: Say, ‘He is the Lord of Mercy; we believe in Him; we put our trust in Him. You will come to know in time who is in obvious error.’

arabic_text: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ مَآؤُكُمْ غَوْرًا فَمَن يَأْتِيكُم بِمَآءٍ مَّعِينٍۭ
translation: Say, ‘Just think: if all your water were to sink deep into the earth who could give you flowing water in its place?’

arabic_text: نٓ ۚ وَٱلْقَلَمِ وَمَا يَسْطُرُونَ
translation: Nun By the pen! By all they write!

arabic_text: مَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ بِمَجْنُونٍ
translation: Your Lord’s grace does not make you [Prophet] a madman:

arabic_text: وَإِنَّ لَكَ لَأَجْرًا غَيْرَ مَمْنُونٍ
translation: you will have a never-ending reward––

arabic_text: وَإِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ خُلُقٍ عَظِيمٍ
translation: truly you have a strong character––

arabic_text: فَسَتُبْصِرُ وَيُبْصِرُونَ
translation: and soon you will see, as will they,

arabic_text: بِأَييِّكُمُ ٱلْمَفْتُونُ
translation: which of you is afflicted with madness.

arabic_text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ
translation: Your Lord knows best who strays from His path and who is rightly guided.

arabic_text: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: So do not yield to those who deny the truth––

arabic_text: وَدُّوا۟ لَوْ تُدْهِنُ فَيُدْهِنُونَ
translation: they want you to compromise with them and then they will compromise with you––

arabic_text: وَلَا تُطِعْ كُلَّ حَلَّافٍ مَّهِينٍ
translation: do not yield to any contemptible swearer,

arabic_text: هَمَّازٍ مَّشَّآءٍۭ بِنَمِيمٍ
translation: to any backbiter, slander-monger,

arabic_text: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
translation: or hinderer of good, to anyone who is sinful, aggressive,

arabic_text: عُتُلٍّۭ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ زَنِيمٍ
translation: coarse, and on top of all that, an imposter.

arabic_text: أَن كَانَ ذَا مَالٍ وَبَنِينَ
translation: Just because he has wealth and sons,

arabic_text: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَـٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
translation: when our revelations are recited to him, he says, ‘These are just ancient fables.’

arabic_text: سَنَسِمُهُۥ عَلَى ٱلْخُرْطُومِ
translation: We shall brand him on the snout!

arabic_text: إِنَّا بَلَوْنَـٰهُمْ كَمَا بَلَوْنَآ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ إِذْ أَقْسَمُوا۟ لَيَصْرِمُنَّهَا مُصْبِحِينَ
translation: We have tried them as We tried the owners of a certain garden, who swore that they would harvest its fruits in the morning

arabic_text: وَلَا يَسْتَثْنُونَ
translation: and made no allowance [for the Will of God]:

arabic_text: فَطَافَ عَلَيْهَا طَآئِفٌ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمْ نَآئِمُونَ
translation: a disaster from your Lord struck the garden as they slept

arabic_text: فَأَصْبَحَتْ كَٱلصَّرِيمِ
translation: and by morning it was stripped bare, a desolate land.

arabic_text: فَتَنَادَوْا۟ مُصْبِحِينَ
translation: Still they called each other at daybreak,

arabic_text: أَنِ ٱغْدُوا۟ عَلَىٰ حَرْثِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰرِمِينَ
translation: ‘Go early to your field if you wish to gather all its fruits,’

arabic_text: فَٱنطَلَقُوا۟ وَهُمْ يَتَخَـٰفَتُونَ
translation: and went off, whispering,

arabic_text: أَن لَّا يَدْخُلَنَّهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ عَلَيْكُم مِّسْكِينٌ
translation: ‘Make sure no poor person enters the garden today!’––

arabic_text: وَغَدَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ حَرْدٍ قَـٰدِرِينَ
translation: they left early, bent on their purpose-

arabic_text: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهَا قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا لَضَآلُّونَ
translation: but when they saw the garden, they said, ‘We must have lost our way!

arabic_text: بَلْ نَحْنُ مَحْرُومُونَ
translation: No- we are ruined!’

arabic_text: قَالَ أَوْسَطُهُمْ أَلَمْ أَقُل لَّكُمْ لَوْلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ
translation: The wisest of them said, ‘Did I not say to you, “Will you not glorify God?”’-

arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ
translation: they said, ‘Glory be to God, Our Lord! Truly, we were doing wrong!’-

arabic_text: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَلَـٰوَمُونَ
translation: and then they turned to each other in mutual reproach.

arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا طَـٰغِينَ
translation: They said, ‘Alas for us! We have done terrible wrong,

arabic_text: عَسَىٰ رَبُّنَآ أَن يُبْدِلَنَا خَيْرًا مِّنْهَآ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا رَٰغِبُونَ
translation: but maybe our Lord will give us something better in its place: we truly turn to Him in hope.’

arabic_text: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْعَذَابُ ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ
translation: Such is the punishment [in this life], but greater still is the punishment in the Hereafter, if only they knew.

arabic_text: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
translation: There will be Gardens of bliss for those who are mindful of God.

arabic_text: أَفَنَجْعَلُ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ كَٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
translation: Should We treat those who submit to Us as We treat those who do evil?

arabic_text: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
translation: What is the matter with you? On what basis do you judge?

arabic_text: أَمْ لَكُمْ كِتَـٰبٌ فِيهِ تَدْرُسُونَ
translation: Do you have a Scripture that tells you

arabic_text: إِنَّ لَكُمْ فِيهِ لَمَا تَخَيَّرُونَ
translation: that you will be granted whatever you choose?

arabic_text: أَمْ لَكُمْ أَيْمَـٰنٌ عَلَيْنَا بَـٰلِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۙ إِنَّ لَكُمْ لَمَا تَحْكُمُونَ
translation: Have you received from Us solemn oaths, binding to the Day of Resurrection, that you will get whatever you yourselves decide?

arabic_text: سَلْهُمْ أَيُّهُم بِذَٰلِكَ زَعِيمٌ
translation: Ask them [Prophet] which of them will guarantee this.

arabic_text: أَمْ لَهُمْ شُرَكَآءُ فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمْ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ
translation: Do they have ‘partners’ [besides God]? Let them produce their ‘partners’, if what they say is true.

arabic_text: يَوْمَ يُكْشَفُ عَن سَاقٍ وَيُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ
translation: On the Day when matters become dire, they will be invited to prostrate themselves but will be prevented from doing so,

arabic_text: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۖ وَقَدْ كَانُوا۟ يُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمْ سَـٰلِمُونَ
translation: and their eyes will be downcast and they will be overwhelmed with shame: they were invited to prostrate themselves when they were safe [but refused].

arabic_text: فَذَرْنِى وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْحَدِيثِ ۖ سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُم مِّنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
translation: So [Prophet] leave those who reject this revelation to Me: We shall lead them on, step by step, in ways beyond their knowledge;

arabic_text: وَأُمْلِى لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ كَيْدِى مَتِينٌ
translation: I will allow them more time, for My plan is powerful.

arabic_text: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
translation: Do you demand some reward from them that would burden them with debt?

arabic_text: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
translation: Do they have knowledge of the unseen that enables them to write it down?

arabic_text: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلْحُوتِ إِذْ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكْظُومٌ
translation: Wait patiently [Prophet] for your Lord’s judgement: do not be like the man in the whale who called out in distress:

arabic_text: لَّوْلَآ أَن تَدَٰرَكَهُۥ نِعْمَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ لَنُبِذَ بِٱلْعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ مَذْمُومٌ
translation: if his Lord’s grace had not reached him, he would have been left, abandoned and blameworthy, on the barren shore,

arabic_text: فَٱجْتَبَـٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَجَعَلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
translation: but his Lord chose him and made him one of the Righteous.

arabic_text: وَإِن يَكَادُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَيُزْلِقُونَكَ بِأَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ لَمَّا سَمِعُوا۟ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُۥ لَمَجْنُونٌ
translation: The disbelievers almost strike you down with their looks when they hear the Quran. They say, ‘He must be mad!’

arabic_text: وَمَا هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
translation: but truly it is nothing other than a Reminder for all peoples.

arabic_text: ٱلْحَآقَّةُ
translation: The Inevitable Hour!

arabic_text: مَا ٱلْحَآقَّةُ
translation: What is the Inevitable Hour?

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْحَآقَّةُ
translation: What will explain to you what the Inevitable Hour is?

arabic_text: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ وَعَادٌۢ بِٱلْقَارِعَةِ
translation: The people of Thamud and 'Ad denied that the crashing blowwould come:

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ بِٱلطَّاغِيَةِ
translation: Thamud was destroyed by a deafening blast;

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا عَادٌ فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ بِرِيحٍ صَرْصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍ
translation: Ad was destroyed by a furious wind

arabic_text: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَبْعَ لَيَالٍ وَثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومًا فَتَرَى ٱلْقَوْمَ فِيهَا صَرْعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ خَاوِيَةٍ
translation: that God let loose against them for seven consecutive nights, eight consecutive days, so that you could have seen its people lying dead like hollow palm-trunks.

arabic_text: فَهَلْ تَرَىٰ لَهُم مِّنۢ بَاقِيَةٍ
translation: Can you see any trace of them now?

arabic_text: وَجَآءَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَن قَبْلَهُۥ وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَـٰتُ بِٱلْخَاطِئَةِ
translation: And there came Pharaoh and those before him and the overturned cities with sin.

arabic_text: فَعَصَوْا۟ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَهُمْ أَخْذَةً رَّابِيَةً
translation: these people committed grave sins and disobeyed the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with an ever-tightening grip.

arabic_text: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلْمَآءُ حَمَلْنَـٰكُمْ فِى ٱلْجَارِيَةِ
translation: But when the Flood rose high, We saved you in the floating ship,

arabic_text: لِنَجْعَلَهَا لَكُمْ تَذْكِرَةً وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٌ وَٰعِيَةٌ
translation: making that event a reminder for you: attentive ears may take heed.

arabic_text: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ نَفْخَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ
translation: When the Trumpet is sounded a single time,

arabic_text: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةً وَٰحِدَةً
translation: when the earth and its mountains are raised high and then crushed with a single blow,

arabic_text: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ وَقَعَتِ ٱلْوَاقِعَةُ
translation: on that Day the Great Event will come to pass.

arabic_text: وَٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَهِىَ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاهِيَةٌ
translation: The sky will be torn apart on that Day, it will be so frail.

arabic_text: وَٱلْمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرْجَآئِهَا ۚ وَيَحْمِلُ عَرْشَ رَبِّكَ فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ ثَمَـٰنِيَةٌ
translation: The angels will be on all sides of it and, on that Day, eight of them will bear the throne of your Lord above them.

arabic_text: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُعْرَضُونَ لَا تَخْفَىٰ مِنكُمْ خَافِيَةٌ
translation: On that Day you will be brought to judgement and none of your secrets will remain hidden.

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقْرَءُوا۟ كِتَـٰبِيَهْ
translation: Anyone who is given his Record in his right hand will say, ‘Here is my Record, read it.

arabic_text: إِنِّى ظَنَنتُ أَنِّى مُلَـٰقٍ حِسَابِيَهْ
translation: I knew I would meet my Reckoning,’

arabic_text: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
translation: and so he will have a pleasant life

arabic_text: فِى جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
translation: in a lofty Garden,

arabic_text: قُطُوفُهَا دَانِيَةٌ
translation: with clustered fruit within his reach.

arabic_text: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَآ أَسْلَفْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَيَّامِ ٱلْخَالِيَةِ
translation: It will be said, ‘Eat and drink to your heart’s content as a reward for what you have done in days gone by.’

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى لَمْ أُوتَ كِتَـٰبِيَهْ
translation: But anyone who is given his Record in his left hand will say, ‘If only I had never been given any Record

arabic_text: وَلَمْ أَدْرِ مَا حِسَابِيَهْ
translation: and knew nothing of my Reckoning.

arabic_text: يَـٰلَيْتَهَا كَانَتِ ٱلْقَاضِيَةَ
translation: How I wish death had been the end of me.

arabic_text: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنِّى مَالِيَهْ ۜ
translation: My wealth has been no use to me,

arabic_text: هَلَكَ عَنِّى سُلْطَـٰنِيَهْ
translation: and my power has vanished.’

arabic_text: خُذُوهُ فَغُلُّوهُ
translation: ‘Take him, put a collar on him,

arabic_text: ثُمَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ صَلُّوهُ
translation: lead him to burn in the blazing Fire,

arabic_text: ثُمَّ فِى سِلْسِلَةٍ ذَرْعُهَا سَبْعُونَ ذِرَاعًا فَٱسْلُكُوهُ
translation: and [bind him] in a chain seventy metres long:

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
translation: he would not believe in Almighty God,

arabic_text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
translation: he never encouraged feeding the hungry,

arabic_text: فَلَيْسَ لَهُ ٱلْيَوْمَ هَـٰهُنَا حَمِيمٌ
translation: so today he has no real friend here,

arabic_text: وَلَا طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنْ غِسْلِينٍ
translation: and the only food he has is the filth

arabic_text: لَّا يَأْكُلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلْخَـٰطِـُٔونَ
translation: that only sinners eat.’

arabic_text: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِمَا تُبْصِرُونَ
translation: So I swear by what you can see

arabic_text: وَمَا لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
translation: and by what you cannot see:

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
translation: this [Quran] is the speech of an honoured messenger,

arabic_text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَاعِرٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تُؤْمِنُونَ
translation: not the words of a poet- how little you believe!-

arabic_text: وَلَا بِقَوْلِ كَاهِنٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
translation: nor the words of a soothsayer- how little you reflect!

arabic_text: تَنزِيلٌ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
translation: This [Quran] is a message sent down from the Lord of the Worlds:

arabic_text: وَلَوْ تَقَوَّلَ عَلَيْنَا بَعْضَ ٱلْأَقَاوِيلِ
translation: if [the Prophet] had attributed some fabrication to Us,

arabic_text: لَأَخَذْنَا مِنْهُ بِٱلْيَمِينِ
translation: We would certainly have seized his right hand

arabic_text: ثُمَّ لَقَطَعْنَا مِنْهُ ٱلْوَتِينَ
translation: and cut off his lifeblood,

arabic_text: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ عَنْهُ حَـٰجِزِينَ
translation: and none of you could have defended him.

arabic_text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَتَذْكِرَةٌ لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
translation: This [Quran] is a reminder for those who are aware of God.

arabic_text: وَإِنَّا لَنَعْلَمُ أَنَّ مِنكُم مُّكَذِّبِينَ
translation: We know that some of you consider it to be lies-

arabic_text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَسْرَةٌ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
translation: this will be a source of bitter regret for the disbelievers-

arabic_text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَقُّ ٱلْيَقِينِ
translation: but it is in fact the certain Truth.

arabic_text: فَسَبِّحْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
translation: So [Prophet] glorify the name of your Lord, the Almighty.

arabic_text: سَأَلَ سَآئِلٌۢ بِعَذَابٍ وَاقِعٍ
translation: A man [mockingly] demanded the punishment.

arabic_text: لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ لَيْسَ لَهُۥ دَافِعٌ
translation: It will fall on the disbelievers––none can deflect it––

arabic_text: مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ذِى ٱلْمَعَارِجِ
translation: from God, the Lord of the Ways of Ascent,

arabic_text: تَعْرُجُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِى يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُۥ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ
translation: by which the angels and the Spirit ascend to Him, on a Day whose length is fifty thousand years.

arabic_text: فَٱصْبِرْ صَبْرًا جَمِيلًا
translation: So be patient, [Prophet], as befits you.

arabic_text: إِنَّهُمْ يَرَوْنَهُۥ بَعِيدًا
translation: The disbelievers think it is distant,

arabic_text: وَنَرَىٰهُ قَرِيبًا
translation: but We know it to be close.

arabic_text: يَوْمَ تَكُونُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ كَٱلْمُهْلِ
translation: On a Day when the heavens will be like molten brass

arabic_text: وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ
translation: and the mountains like tufts of wool,

arabic_text: وَلَا يَسْـَٔلُ حَمِيمٌ حَمِيمًا
translation: when no friend will ask about his friend,

arabic_text: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِى مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍۭ بِبَنِيهِ
translation: even when they are within sight of one another. The guilty person will wish he could save himself from the suffering of that Day by sacrificing his sons,

arabic_text: وَصَـٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَأَخِيهِ
translation: his spouse, his brother,

arabic_text: وَفَصِيلَتِهِ ٱلَّتِى تُـْٔوِيهِ
translation: the kinsfolk who gave him shelter,

arabic_text: وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ
translation: and everyone on earth, if it could save him.

arabic_text: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّهَا لَظَىٰ
translation: But no! There is a raging flame

arabic_text: نَزَّاعَةً لِّلشَّوَىٰ
translation: that strips away the skin,

arabic_text: تَدْعُوا۟ مَنْ أَدْبَرَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
translation: and it will claim everyone who rejects the truth, turns away,

arabic_text: وَجَمَعَ فَأَوْعَىٰٓ
translation: amasses wealth and hoards it.

arabic_text: ۞ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا
translation: Man was truly created anxious:

arabic_text: إِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ جَزُوعًا
translation: he is fretful when misfortune touches him,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلْخَيْرُ مَنُوعًا
translation: but tight-fisted when good fortune comes his way.

arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ
translation: Not so those who pray

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ دَآئِمُونَ
translation: and are constant in their prayers;

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ فِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّ مَّعْلُومٌ
translation: who give a due share of their wealth

arabic_text: لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ
translation: to beggars and the deprived;

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُصَدِّقُونَ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
translation: who believe in the Day of Judgement

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
translation: and fear the punishment of their Lord––

arabic_text: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمْ غَيْرُ مَأْمُونٍ
translation: none may feel wholly secure from it––

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَـٰفِظُونَ
translation: who guard their chastity

arabic_text: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
translation: from all but their spouses or their slave-girls––there is no blame attached to [relations with] these,

arabic_text: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ
translation: but those whose desires exceed this limit are truly transgressors––

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَـٰنَـٰتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَٰعُونَ
translation: who are faithful to their trusts and their pledges;

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِشَهَـٰدَٰتِهِمْ قَآئِمُونَ
translation: who give honest testimony

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
translation: and are steadfast in their prayers.

arabic_text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ مُّكْرَمُونَ
translation: They will be honoured in Gardens of bliss.

arabic_text: فَمَالِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ قِبَلَكَ مُهْطِعِينَ
translation: What is wrong with the disbelievers? Why do they rush to peer at you [Prophet],

arabic_text: عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ عِزِينَ
translation: from right and left, in crowds?

arabic_text: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ
translation: Does every one of them expect to enter a Garden of bliss?

arabic_text: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُم مِّمَّا يَعْلَمُونَ
translation: No! We created them from the substance they know,

arabic_text: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ وَٱلْمَغَـٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
translation: and, by the Lord of every sunrise and sunset, We have the power

arabic_text: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
translation: to substitute for them others better than they are- nothing can prevent Us from doing this.

arabic_text: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا۟ وَيَلْعَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
translation: So leave them to wallow in idle talk, until they come face to face with their promised Day,

arabic_text: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍ يُوفِضُونَ
translation: the Day they will rush out of their graves as if rallying to a flag,

arabic_text: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ
translation: eyes downcast and covered in shame: that is the Day of which they were warned.

arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦٓ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
translation: We sent Noah to his people: ‘Warn your people, before a painful punishment comes to them.’

arabic_text: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
translation: And so he said, ‘My people, I am here to warn you plainly.

arabic_text: أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
translation: Serve God, be mindful of Him and obey me.

arabic_text: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
translation: He will forgive you your sins and spare you until your appointed time––when God’s appointed time arrives it cannot be postponed. If only you understood!’

arabic_text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِى لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
translation: He said, ‘My Lord, I have called my people night and day,

arabic_text: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَآءِىٓ إِلَّا فِرَارًا
translation: but the more I call them, the further they run away:

arabic_text: وَإِنِّى كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوٓا۟ أَصَـٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَٱسْتَغْشَوْا۟ ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا۟ وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ ٱسْتِكْبَارًا
translation: every time I call them, so that You may forgive them, they thrust their fingers into their ears, cover their heads with their garments, persist in their rejection, and grow more insolent and arrogant.

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
translation: I have tried calling them openly.

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
translation: I have tried preaching to them in public and speaking to them in private.

arabic_text: فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
translation: I said, “Ask forgiveness of your Lord: He is ever forgiving.

arabic_text: يُرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًا
translation: He will send down abundant rain from the sky for you;

arabic_text: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَٰلٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَـٰرًا
translation: He will give you wealth and sons; He will provide you with gardens and rivers.

arabic_text: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
translation: What is the matter with you? Why will you not fear God’s majesty,

arabic_text: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
translation: when He has created you stage by stage?

arabic_text: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا
translation: Have you ever wondered how God created seven heavens, one above the other,

arabic_text: وَجَعَلَ ٱلْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
translation: placed the moon as a light in them and the sun as a lamp,

arabic_text: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
translation: how God made you spring forth from the earth like a plant,

arabic_text: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
translation: how He will return you into it and then bring you out again,

arabic_text: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
translation: and how He has spread the Earth out for you

arabic_text: لِّتَسْلُكُوا۟ مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا
translation: to walk along its spacious paths?” ’

arabic_text: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِى وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
translation: Noah said, ‘My Lord, they have disobeyed me and followed those whose riches and children only increase their ruin;

arabic_text: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا
translation: who have made a grand plan,

arabic_text: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
translation: saying, “Do not renounce your gods! Do not renounce Wadd, Suwa, Yaghuth, Yauq, or Nasr!”

arabic_text: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَـٰلًا
translation: They have led many astray. Lord, bring nothing but destruction down on the evildoers!’

arabic_text: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٔـٰتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا۟ فَأُدْخِلُوا۟ نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارًا
translation: They were drowned and sent to Hell for their evildoings: they found no one to help them against God.

arabic_text: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
translation: And Noah said, ‘Lord, do not leave any of the disbelievers on the earth-

arabic_text: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
translation: if you leave them they will lead Your servants astray and beget only sinners and disbelievers-

arabic_text: رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَلِوَٰلِدَىَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِىَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًۢا
translation: Lord, forgive me, my parents, and whoever enters my house as a believer. Forgive believing men and women but bring nothing but ruin down on the evildoers!’

arabic_text: قُلْ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْءَانًا عَجَبًا
translation: Say [Prophet], ‘It has been revealed to me that a group of jinn once listened in and said, “We have heard a wondrous Quran,

arabic_text: يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشْدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدًا
translation: that gives guidance to the right path, and we have come to believe it––We shall never set up partners with our Lord––

arabic_text: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَـٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَـٰحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا
translation: and that He––exalted be the glory of our Lord!––has neither spouse nor child.

arabic_text: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطًا
translation: Outrageous things have been said about God by the foolish among us,

arabic_text: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلْإِنسُ وَٱلْجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا
translation: although we had thought that no man or jinn would [dare to] tell a lie about Him.

arabic_text: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا
translation: Men have sought refuge with the jinn in the past, but they only misguided them further.

arabic_text: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدًا
translation: They thought, as you did, that God would never raise anyone from the dead.

arabic_text: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدْنَـٰهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا
translation: We tried to reach heaven, but discovered it to be full of stern guards and shooting stars––

arabic_text: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَـٰعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ ٱلْـَٔانَ يَجِدْ لَهُۥ شِهَابًا رَّصَدًا
translation: we used to sit in places there, listening, but anyone trying to listen now will find a shooting star lying in wait for him––

arabic_text: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِىٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
translation: [so now] we do not know whether those who live on earth are due for misfortune, or whether their Lord intends to guide them.

arabic_text: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدًا
translation: Some of us are righteous and others less so: we follow different paths.

arabic_text: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُۥ هَرَبًا
translation: We know we can never frustrate God on earth; we can never escape Him.

arabic_text: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا
translation: When we heard the guidance we came to believe: whoever believes in his Lord need fear no loss nor injustice.

arabic_text: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا۟ رَشَدًا
translation: Some of us submit to Him and others go the wrong way: those who submit to God have found wise guidance,

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا۟ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا
translation: but those who go wrong will be fuel for Hellfire.” ’

arabic_text: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَـٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقًا
translation: If they had taken to the right way, We would have given them abundant water to drink-

arabic_text: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا
translation: a test for them––but anyone who turns away from his Lord’s Revelation will be sent by Him to spiralling torment.

arabic_text: وَأَنَّ ٱلْمَسَـٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدًا
translation: Places of worship are for God alone- so do not pray to anyone other than God-

arabic_text: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا۟ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا
translation: yet when God’s Servant stood up to pray to Him, they pressed in on him.

arabic_text: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
translation: Say, ‘I pray to my Lord alone; I set up no partner with Him.’

arabic_text: قُلْ إِنِّى لَآ أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا
translation: Say, ‘I have no control over any harm or good that may befall you.’

arabic_text: قُلْ إِنِّى لَن يُجِيرَنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلْتَحَدًا
translation: Say, ‘No one can protect me from God: I have no refuge except in Him.

arabic_text: إِلَّا بَلَـٰغًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَـٰلَـٰتِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يَعْصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا
translation: I only deliver [what I receive] from God- only His messages.’ Whoever disobeys God and His Messenger will have Hell’s Fire as his permanent home:

arabic_text: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
translation: when they are confronted by what they have been warned about, they will realize who has the weaker protector and the smaller number.

arabic_text: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّىٓ أَمَدًا
translation: Say, ‘I do not know whether what you have been warned about is near, or whether a distant time has been appointed for it by my Lord.’

arabic_text: عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
translation: He is the One who knows what is hidden.

arabic_text: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسْلُكُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ رَصَدًا
translation: He does not disclose it except to a messenger of His choosing. He sends watchers to go in front and behind

arabic_text: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا۟ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عَدَدًۢا
translation: to ensure that each of His messengers delivers his Lord’s message: He knows all about them, and He takes account of everything.

arabic_text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُزَّمِّلُ
translation: You [Prophet], enfolded in your cloak!

arabic_text: قُمِ ٱلَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
translation: Stay up throughout the night, all but a small part of it,

arabic_text: نِّصْفَهُۥٓ أَوِ ٱنقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا
translation: half, or a little less,

arabic_text: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَرْتِيلًا
translation: or a little more; recite the Quran slowly and distinctly:

arabic_text: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِى عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًا ثَقِيلًا
translation: We shall send a momentous message down to you.

arabic_text: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيْلِ هِىَ أَشَدُّ وَطْـًٔا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا
translation: Night prayer makes a deeper impression and sharpens words––

arabic_text: إِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبْحًا طَوِيلًا
translation: you are kept busy for long periods of the day––

arabic_text: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
translation: so celebrate the name of your Lord and devote yourself wholeheart-edly to Him.

arabic_text: رَّبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا
translation: He is Lord of the east and west, there is no god but Him, so take Him as your Protector,

arabic_text: وَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًا جَمِيلًا
translation: patiently endure what they say, ignore them politely,

arabic_text: وَذَرْنِى وَٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُو۟لِى ٱلنَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا
translation: and leave to Me those who deny the truth and live in luxury. Bear with them for a little while;

arabic_text: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَآ أَنكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا
translation: We have fetters, a blazing fire,

arabic_text: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
translation: food that chokes, and agonizing torment in store for them

arabic_text: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَّهِيلًا
translation: on the Day when the earth and the mountains will shake. The mountains will become a heap of loose sand.

arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَـٰهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا
translation: We have sent a messenger to you [people] to be your witness, just as We sent a messenger to Pharaoh,

arabic_text: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا
translation: but Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger and so We inflicted a heavy punishment on him.

arabic_text: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ ٱلْوِلْدَٰنَ شِيبًا
translation: So if you disbelieve, how can you guard yourselves against a Day that will turn children’s hair grey,

arabic_text: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرٌۢ بِهِۦ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَفْعُولًا
translation: a Day when the sky will be torn apart? God’s promise will certainly be fulfilled.

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
translation: This is a reminder. Let whoever wishes take the way to his Lord.

arabic_text: ۞ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَىِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُۥ وَثُلُثَهُۥ وَطَآئِفَةٌ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا ۚ وَٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌۢ
translation: [Prophet], your Lord is well aware that you sometimes spend nearly two-thirds of the night at prayer––sometimes half, sometimes a third––as do some of your followers. God determines the division of night and day. He knows that you will not be able to keep a measure of it and He has relented towards all of you, so recite as much of the Quran as is easy for you. He knows that some of you will be sick, some of you travelling through the land seeking God’s bounty, some of you fighting in God’s way: recite as much as is easy for you, keep up the prayer, pay the prescribed alms, and make God a good loan. Whatever good you store up for yourselves will be improved and increased for you. Ask God for His forgiveness, He is most forgiving, most merciful.

arabic_text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُدَّثِّرُ
translation: You, wrapped in your cloak,

arabic_text: قُمْ فَأَنذِرْ
translation: arise and give warning!

arabic_text: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ
translation: Proclaim the greatness of your Lord;

arabic_text: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ
translation: cleanse yourself;

arabic_text: وَٱلرُّجْزَ فَٱهْجُرْ
translation: keep away from all filth;

arabic_text: وَلَا تَمْنُن تَسْتَكْثِرُ
translation: do not be overwhelmed and weaken;

arabic_text: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَٱصْبِرْ
translation: be steadfast in your Lord’s cause.

arabic_text: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِى ٱلنَّاقُورِ
translation: When the Trumpet sounds,

arabic_text: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ
translation: that will be a Day of anguish for the disbelievers.

arabic_text: عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍ
translation: They will have no ease.

arabic_text: ذَرْنِى وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًا
translation: [Prophet], leave Me to deal with the one I created helpless,

arabic_text: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُۥ مَالًا مَّمْدُودًا
translation: then gave vast wealth,

arabic_text: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًا
translation: and sons by his side,

arabic_text: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُۥ تَمْهِيدًا
translation: making everything easy for him––

arabic_text: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ
translation: yet he still hopes I will give him more.

arabic_text: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا عَنِيدًا
translation: No! He has been stubbornly hostile to Our revelation:

arabic_text: سَأُرْهِقُهُۥ صَعُودًا
translation: I will inflict a spiralling torment on him.

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
translation: He planned and plotted––

arabic_text: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
translation: devilishly he plotted!

arabic_text: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
translation: ferociously he plotted!––

arabic_text: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
translation: and looked

arabic_text: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
translation: and frowned and scowled

arabic_text: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَٱسْتَكْبَرَ
translation: and turned away and behaved arrogantly

arabic_text: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ
translation: and said, ‘This is just old sorcery,

arabic_text: إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا قَوْلُ ٱلْبَشَرِ
translation: just the talk of a mortal!’

arabic_text: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ
translation: I will throw him into the scorching Fire.

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سَقَرُ
translation: What will explain to you what the scorching Fire is?

arabic_text: لَا تُبْقِى وَلَا تَذَرُ
translation: It spares nothing and leaves nothing;

arabic_text: لَوَّاحَةٌ لِّلْبَشَرِ
translation: it scorches the flesh of humans;

arabic_text: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ
translation: there are nineteen in charge of it––

arabic_text: وَمَا جَعَلْنَآ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَـٰٓئِكَةً ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَيَزْدَادَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِيمَـٰنًا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا مَثَلًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِىَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ
translation: none other than angels appointed by Us to guard Hellfire- and We have made their number a test for the disbelievers. So those who have been given the Scripture will be certain and those who believe will have their faith increased: neither those who have been given the Scripture nor the believers will have any doubts, but the sick at heart and the disbelievers will say, ‘What could God mean by this description?’ God leaves whoever He will to stray and guides whoever He will- no one knows your Lord’s forces except Him- this [description] is a warning to mortals.

arabic_text: كَلَّا وَٱلْقَمَرِ
translation: Yes––by the moon!

arabic_text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ
translation: By the departing night!

arabic_text: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَآ أَسْفَرَ
translation: By the shining dawn!

arabic_text: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى ٱلْكُبَرِ
translation: It is one of the mightiest things,

arabic_text: نَذِيرًا لِّلْبَشَرِ
translation: a warning to all mortals,

arabic_text: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
translation: to those of you who choose to go ahead and those who lag behind.

arabic_text: كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
translation: Every soul is held in pledge for its deeds,

arabic_text: إِلَّآ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْيَمِينِ
translation: but the Companions of the Right will stay

arabic_text: فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
translation: in Gardens and ask

arabic_text: عَنِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
translation: about the guilty.

arabic_text: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِى سَقَرَ
translation: ‘What drove you to the Scorching Fire?’ [they will ask]

arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ
translation: and they will answer, ‘We did not pray;

arabic_text: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ ٱلْمِسْكِينَ
translation: we did not feed the poor;

arabic_text: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ ٱلْخَآئِضِينَ
translation: we indulged with others [in mocking the believers];

arabic_text: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
translation: we denied the Day of Judgement

arabic_text: حَتَّىٰٓ أَتَىٰنَا ٱلْيَقِينُ
translation: until the Certain End came upon us.’

arabic_text: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَـٰعَةُ ٱلشَّـٰفِعِينَ
translation: No intercessor’s plea will benefit them now.

arabic_text: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ ٱلتَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ
translation: What is the matter with them? Why do they turn away from the warning,

arabic_text: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌ مُّسْتَنفِرَةٌ
translation: like frightened asses

arabic_text: فَرَّتْ مِن قَسْوَرَةٍۭ
translation: fleeing from a lion?

arabic_text: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُّنَشَّرَةً
translation: Each one of them demands that a scripture be sent down to him and unrolled before his very eyes-

arabic_text: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ
translation: No! Truly they have no fear of the life to come-

arabic_text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُۥ تَذْكِرَةٌ
translation: but truly this is a reminder.

arabic_text: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
translation: Let whoever wishes to take heed do so:

arabic_text: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ
translation: they will only take heed if God so wishes. He is the Lord who should be heeded, the Lord of forgiveness.

arabic_text: لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ
translation: By the Day of Resurrection

arabic_text: وَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلنَّفْسِ ٱللَّوَّامَةِ
translation: and by the self-reproaching soul!

arabic_text: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَلَّن نَّجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُۥ
translation: Does man think We shall not put his bones back together?

arabic_text: بَلَىٰ قَـٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّىَ بَنَانَهُۥ
translation: In fact, We can reshape his very fingertips.

arabic_text: بَلْ يُرِيدُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُۥ
translation: Yet man wants to deny what is ahead of him:

arabic_text: يَسْـَٔلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ
translation: he says, ‘So, when will this Day of Resurrection be?’

arabic_text: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ ٱلْبَصَرُ
translation: When eyes are dazzled

arabic_text: وَخَسَفَ ٱلْقَمَرُ
translation: and the moon eclipsed,

arabic_text: وَجُمِعَ ٱلشَّمْسُ وَٱلْقَمَرُ
translation: when the sun and the moon are brought together,

arabic_text: يَقُولُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ ٱلْمَفَرُّ
translation: on that Day man will say, ‘Where can I escape?’

arabic_text: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
translation: Truly, there is no refuge:

arabic_text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمُسْتَقَرُّ
translation: they will all return to your Lord on that Day.

arabic_text: يُنَبَّؤُا۟ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
translation: On that Day, man will be told what he put first and what he put last.

arabic_text: بَلِ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِۦ بَصِيرَةٌ
translation: Truly, man is a clear witness against himself,

arabic_text: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُۥ
translation: despite all the excuses he may put forward.

arabic_text: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِۦٓ
translation: [Prophet], do not rush your tongue in an attempt to hasten [your memorization of] the Revelation:

arabic_text: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُۥ وَقُرْءَانَهُۥ
translation: We shall make sure of its safe collection and recitation.

arabic_text: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَـٰهُ فَٱتَّبِعْ قُرْءَانَهُۥ
translation: When We have recited it, repeat the recitation

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُۥ
translation: and We shall make it clear.

arabic_text: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ
translation: Truly you [people] love this fleeting world

arabic_text: وَتَذَرُونَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ
translation: and neglect the life to come.

arabic_text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاضِرَةٌ
translation: On that Day there will be radiant faces,

arabic_text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌ
translation: looking towards their Lord,

arabic_text: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بَاسِرَةٌ
translation: and on that Day there will be the sad and despairing faces

arabic_text: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ
translation: of those who realize that a great calamity is about to befall them.

arabic_text: كَلَّآ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلتَّرَاقِىَ
translation: Truly, when the soul reaches the collarbone;

arabic_text: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍ
translation: when it is said, ‘Could any charm-healer save him now?’;

arabic_text: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ ٱلْفِرَاقُ
translation: when he knows it is the final parting;

arabic_text: وَٱلْتَفَّتِ ٱلسَّاقُ بِٱلسَّاقِ
translation: when his legs are brought together:

arabic_text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمَسَاقُ
translation: on that day he will be driven towards your Lord.

arabic_text: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
translation: He neither believed nor prayed,

arabic_text: وَلَـٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
translation: but denied the truth and turned away,

arabic_text: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ يَتَمَطَّىٰٓ
translation: walking back to his people with a conceited swagger.

arabic_text: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
translation: Closer and closer it comes to you.

arabic_text: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰٓ
translation: Closer and closer still.

arabic_text: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى
translation: Does man think he will be left alone?

arabic_text: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِّن مَّنِىٍّ يُمْنَىٰ
translation: Was he not just a drop of spilt-out sperm,

arabic_text: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
translation: which became a clinging form, which God shaped in due proportion,

arabic_text: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ ٱلزَّوْجَيْنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ
translation: fashioning from it the two sexes, male and female?

arabic_text: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحْـِۧىَ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ
translation: Does He who can do this not have the power to bring the dead back to life?

arabic_text: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ حِينٌ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًٔا مَّذْكُورًا
translation: Was there not a period of time when man was nothing to speak of ?

arabic_text: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا
translation: We created man from a drop of mingled fluid to put him to the test; We gave him hearing and sight;

arabic_text: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
translation: We guided him to the right path, whether he was grateful or not.

arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ سَلَـٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَـٰلًا وَسَعِيرًا
translation: We have prepared chains, iron collars, and blazing Fire for the disbelievers, but

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
translation: the righteous will have a drink mixed with kafur,

arabic_text: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
translation: a spring for God’s servants, which flows abundantly at their wish.

arabic_text: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًا
translation: They fulfil their vows; they fear a day of widespread woes;

arabic_text: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
translation: they give food to the poor, the orphan, and the captive, though they love it themselves,

arabic_text: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
translation: saying, ‘We feed you for the sake of God alone: We seek neither recompense nor thanks from you.

arabic_text: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
translation: We fear the Day of our Lord––a woefully grim Day.’

arabic_text: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
translation: So God will save them from the woes of that Day, give them radiance and gladness,

arabic_text: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
translation: and reward them, for their steadfastness, with a Garden and silken robes.

arabic_text: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
translation: They will sit on couches, feeling neither scorching heat nor biting cold,

arabic_text: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
translation: with shady [branches] spread above them and clusters of fruit hanging close at hand.

arabic_text: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠
translation: They will be served with silver plates

arabic_text: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
translation: and gleaming silver goblets according to their fancy,

arabic_text: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
translation: and they will be given a drink infused with ginger

arabic_text: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
translation: from a spring called Salsabil.

arabic_text: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
translation: Everlasting youths will attend them––if you could see them, you would think they were scattered pearls––

arabic_text: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
translation: and if you were to look around, you would see bliss and great wealth:

arabic_text: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
translation: they will wear garments of green silk and brocade; they will be adorned with silver bracelets; their Lord will give them a pure drink.

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
translation: [It will be said], ‘This is your reward. Your endeavours are appreciated.’

arabic_text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًا
translation: We Ourself have sent down this Quran to you [Prophet] in gradual revelation.

arabic_text: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
translation: Await your Lord’s Judgement with patience; do not yield to any of these sinners or disbelievers;

arabic_text: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
translation: remember the name of your Lord at dawn and in the evening;
