arabic_text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
translation: bow down before Him, and glorify Him at length by night.

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
translation: These people love the fleeting life. They put aside [all thoughts of] a Heavy Day.

arabic_text: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
translation: Yet We created them; We strengthened their constitution; if We please, We can replace such people completely.

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
translation: This is a reminder. Let whoever wishes, take the way to his Lord.

arabic_text: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
translation: But you will only wish to do so if God wills- God is all knowing, all wise-

arabic_text: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا
translation: He admits whoever He will into His Mercy and has prepared a painful torment for the disbelievers.

arabic_text: وَٱلْمُرْسَلَـٰتِ عُرْفًا
translation: By the [winds] sent forth in swift succession,

arabic_text: فَٱلْعَـٰصِفَـٰتِ عَصْفًا
translation: violently storming,

arabic_text: وَٱلنَّـٰشِرَٰتِ نَشْرًا
translation: scattering far and wide,

arabic_text: فَٱلْفَـٰرِقَـٰتِ فَرْقًا
translation: separating forcefully,

arabic_text: فَٱلْمُلْقِيَـٰتِ ذِكْرًا
translation: delivering a reminder,

arabic_text: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
translation: as a proof or a warning:

arabic_text: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
translation: what you are promised will come to pass.

arabic_text: فَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
translation: When the stars are dimmed

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ فُرِجَتْ
translation: and the sky is torn apart,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
translation: when the mountains are turned to dust

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
translation: and the messengers given their appointed time––

arabic_text: لِأَىِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
translation: for what Day has all this been set?

arabic_text: لِيَوْمِ ٱلْفَصْلِ
translation: The Day of Decision.

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ
translation: What will explain to you what the Day of Decision is?

arabic_text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe, on that Day, to those who denied the truth!

arabic_text: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
translation: Did We not destroy the first [of them]?

arabic_text: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
translation: We shall make the last follow them:

arabic_text: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
translation: this is how We deal with the guilty.

arabic_text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe, on that Day, to those who denied the truth!

arabic_text: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّآءٍ مَّهِينٍ
translation: Did We not make you from an underrated fluid

arabic_text: فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ فِى قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
translation: which We housed in a safe lodging

arabic_text: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
translation: for a determined period?

arabic_text: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْقَـٰدِرُونَ
translation: We determine [it]: how excellently We determine!

arabic_text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe, on that Day, to those who denied the truth!

arabic_text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
translation: Did We not make the earth a home

arabic_text: أَحْيَآءً وَأَمْوَٰتًا
translation: for the living and the dead?

arabic_text: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ شَـٰمِخَـٰتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَـٰكُم مَّآءً فُرَاتًا
translation: Did We not place firm, lofty mountains on it and provide you with sweet water?

arabic_text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe, on that Day, to those who denied the truth!

arabic_text: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
translation: They will be told, ‘Go to that which you used to deny!

arabic_text: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِى ثَلَـٰثِ شُعَبٍ
translation: Go to a shadow of smoke!’ It rises in three columns;

arabic_text: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
translation: no shade does it give, nor relief from the flame;

arabic_text: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِى بِشَرَرٍ كَٱلْقَصْرِ
translation: it shoots out sparks as large as treetrunks

arabic_text: كَأَنَّهُۥ جِمَـٰلَتٌ صُفْرٌ
translation: and as bright as copper.

arabic_text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe, on that Day, to those who denied the truth!

arabic_text: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
translation: On that Day they will be speechless,

arabic_text: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
translation: and they will be given no chance to offer any excuses.

arabic_text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe, on that Day, to those who denied the truth!

arabic_text: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَـٰكُمْ وَٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
translation: [They will be told], ‘This is the Day of Decision: We have gathered you and earlier generations.

arabic_text: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ
translation: If you have any plots against Me, try them now.’

arabic_text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe, on that Day, to those who denied the truth!

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى ظِلَـٰلٍ وَعُيُونٍ
translation: But those who took heed of God will enjoy cool shade, springs,

arabic_text: وَفَوَٰكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
translation: and any fruit they desire;

arabic_text: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
translation: [they will be told], ‘Eat and drink to your hearts’ content as a reward for your deeds:

arabic_text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
translation: this is how We reward those who do good.’

arabic_text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe, on that Day, to those who denied the truth!

arabic_text: كُلُوا۟ وَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ
translation: [You may] eat and enjoy yourselves for a short while, evildoers that you are.

arabic_text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe, on that Day, to those who denied the truth!

arabic_text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
translation: When they are told, ‘Bow down in prayer,’ they do not do so.

arabic_text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe, on that Day, to those who denied the truth!

arabic_text: فَبِأَىِّ حَدِيثٍۭ بَعْدَهُۥ يُؤْمِنُونَ
translation: In what revelation, after this, will they believe?

arabic_text: عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
translation: What are they asking about?

arabic_text: عَنِ ٱلنَّبَإِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
translation: The momentous announcement

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
translation: about which they differ.

arabic_text: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
translation: They will find out.

arabic_text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
translation: In the end they will find out.

arabic_text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ مِهَـٰدًا
translation: Did We not make the earth smooth,

arabic_text: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا
translation: and make the mountains to keep it stable?

arabic_text: وَخَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ أَزْوَٰجًا
translation: Did We not create you in pairs,

arabic_text: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا
translation: give you sleep for rest,

arabic_text: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا
translation: the night as a cover,

arabic_text: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلنَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا
translation: and the day for your livelihood?

arabic_text: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا
translation: Did We not build seven strong [heavens] above you,

arabic_text: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا
translation: and make a blazing lamp?

arabic_text: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلْمُعْصِرَٰتِ مَآءً ثَجَّاجًا
translation: Did We not send water pouring down from the clouds

arabic_text: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِۦ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا
translation: to bring forth with it grain, plants,

arabic_text: وَجَنَّـٰتٍ أَلْفَافًا
translation: and luxuriant gardens?

arabic_text: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَـٰتًا
translation: A time has been appointed for the Day of Decision:

arabic_text: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
translation: a Day when the Trumpet will sound and you will come forward in crowds,

arabic_text: وَفُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَٰبًا
translation: when the sky will open up like wide portals,

arabic_text: وَسُيِّرَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
translation: when the mountains will vanish like a mirage.

arabic_text: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا
translation: Hell lies in wait,

arabic_text: لِّلطَّـٰغِينَ مَـَٔابًا
translation: a home for oppressors

arabic_text: لَّـٰبِثِينَ فِيهَآ أَحْقَابًا
translation: to stay in for a long, long time,

arabic_text: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
translation: where they will taste no coolness nor drink

arabic_text: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا
translation: except one that is scalding and dark––

arabic_text: جَزَآءً وِفَاقًا
translation: a fitting requital,

arabic_text: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا
translation: for they did not fear a reckoning,

arabic_text: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا كِذَّابًا
translation: and they rejected Our messages as lies.

arabic_text: وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَـٰهُ كِتَـٰبًا
translation: We have recorded everything in a Record.

arabic_text: فَذُوقُوا۟ فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
translation: ‘Taste this: all you will get from Us is more torment.’

arabic_text: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
translation: For those who were aware of God there is supreme fulfilment:

arabic_text: حَدَآئِقَ وَأَعْنَـٰبًا
translation: private gardens, vineyards,

arabic_text: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا
translation: nubile, well-matched companions,

arabic_text: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا
translation: and an overflowing cup.

arabic_text: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّٰبًا
translation: There they will hear no vain or lying talk:

arabic_text: جَزَآءً مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَآءً حِسَابًا
translation: a reward from your Lord, a fitting gift

arabic_text: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
translation: from the Lord of the heavens and earth and everything between, the Lord of Mercy. They will have no authority from Him to speak.

arabic_text: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
translation: On the Day when the Spirit and the angels stand in rows, they will not speak except for those to whom the Lord of Mercy gives permission, who will say only what is right.

arabic_text: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
translation: That is the Day of Truth. So whoever wishes to do so should take the path that leads to his Lord.

arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَنذَرْنَـٰكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلْكَافِرُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى كُنتُ تُرَٰبًۢا
translation: We have warned you of imminent torment, on the Day when every person will see what their own hands have sent ahead for them, when the disbeliever will say, ‘If only I were dust!’

arabic_text: وَٱلنَّـٰزِعَـٰتِ غَرْقًا
translation: By the forceful chargers

arabic_text: وَٱلنَّـٰشِطَـٰتِ نَشْطًا
translation: raring to go,

arabic_text: وَٱلسَّـٰبِحَـٰتِ سَبْحًا
translation: sweeping ahead at full stretch,

arabic_text: فَٱلسَّـٰبِقَـٰتِ سَبْقًا
translation: overtaking swiftly

arabic_text: فَٱلْمُدَبِّرَٰتِ أَمْرًا
translation: to bring the matter to an end,

arabic_text: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلرَّاجِفَةُ
translation: on the Day when the blast reverberates

arabic_text: تَتْبَعُهَا ٱلرَّادِفَةُ
translation: and the second blast follows,

arabic_text: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ
translation: hearts will tremble

arabic_text: أَبْصَـٰرُهَا خَـٰشِعَةٌ
translation: and eyes will be downcast.

arabic_text: يَقُولُونَ أَءِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِى ٱلْحَافِرَةِ
translation: They say, ‘What? shall we be brought back to life,

arabic_text: أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَـٰمًا نَّخِرَةً
translation: after we have turned into decayed bones?’ and they say,

arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ
translation: ‘Such a return is impossible!’

arabic_text: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ
translation: But all it will take is a single blast,

arabic_text: فَإِذَا هُم بِٱلسَّاهِرَةِ
translation: and they will be back above ground.

arabic_text: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ
translation: Have you [Prophet] heard the story of Moses?

arabic_text: إِذْ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
translation: His Lord called out to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa:

arabic_text: ٱذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
translation: ‘Go to Pharaoh, for he has exceeded all bounds,

arabic_text: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
translation: and ask him, “Do you want to purify yourself [of sin]?

arabic_text: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
translation: Do you want me to guide you to your Lord, so that you may hold Him in awe?” ’

arabic_text: فَأَرَىٰهُ ٱلْـَٔايَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
translation: Moses showed him the great sign,

arabic_text: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
translation: but he denied it and refused [the faith].

arabic_text: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
translation: He turned away and hastily

arabic_text: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
translation: gathered his people, proclaiming,

arabic_text: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
translation: ‘I am your supreme lord,’

arabic_text: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّهُ نَكَالَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَٱلْأُولَىٰٓ
translation: so God condemned him to punishment in the life to come as well as in this life:

arabic_text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰٓ
translation: there truly is a lesson in this for anyone who stands in awe of God.

arabic_text: ءَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ ۚ بَنَىٰهَا
translation: Which is harder to create: you people or the sky that He built,

arabic_text: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّىٰهَا
translation: raising it high and perfecting it,

arabic_text: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَىٰهَا
translation: giving darkness to its night and bringing out its morning brightness,

arabic_text: وَٱلْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَىٰهَآ
translation: and the earth, too, He spread out,

arabic_text: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَآءَهَا وَمَرْعَىٰهَا
translation: bringing waters and pastures out of it,

arabic_text: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَرْسَىٰهَا
translation: and setting firm mountains [in it]

arabic_text: مَتَـٰعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَـٰمِكُمْ
translation: for you and your animals to enjoy?

arabic_text: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلطَّآمَّةُ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
translation: When the great overwhelming event arrives

arabic_text: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا سَعَىٰ
translation: on the Day that man remembers what he has done

arabic_text: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
translation: and Hell is there for all to see,

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
translation: for anyone who has transgressed

arabic_text: وَءَاثَرَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
translation: and preferred the present life

arabic_text: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ
translation: Hell will be home;

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفْسَ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ
translation: for anyone who feared the meeting with his Lord and restrained himself from base desires,

arabic_text: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَنَّةَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ
translation: Paradise will be home.

arabic_text: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَىٰهَا
translation: They ask you [Prophet] about the Hour,

arabic_text: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَىٰهَآ
translation: saying, ‘When will it arrive?’, but how can you tell [them that]?

arabic_text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَآ
translation: Its time is known only to your Lord;

arabic_text: إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰهَا
translation: you are only sent to warn those who fear it.

arabic_text: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَىٰهَا
translation: On the Day they see it, it will seem they lingered [in this life] an evening [at most,] or its morning.

arabic_text: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
translation: He frowned and turned away

arabic_text: أَن جَآءَهُ ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ
translation: when the blind man came to him––

arabic_text: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ يَزَّكَّىٰٓ
translation: for all you know, he might have grown in spirit,

arabic_text: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰٓ
translation: or taken note of something useful to him.

arabic_text: أَمَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰ
translation: For the self-satisfied one

arabic_text: فَأَنتَ لَهُۥ تَصَدَّىٰ
translation: you go out of your way––

arabic_text: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
translation: though you are not to be blamed for his lack of spiritual growth––

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَن جَآءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
translation: but from the one who has come to you full of eagerness

arabic_text: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
translation: and awe

arabic_text: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
translation: you allow yourself to be distracted.

arabic_text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ
translation: No indeed! This [Quran] is a lesson

arabic_text: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
translation: from which those who wish to be taught should learn,

arabic_text: فِى صُحُفٍ مُّكَرَّمَةٍ
translation: [written] on honoured,

arabic_text: مَّرْفُوعَةٍ مُّطَهَّرَةٍۭ
translation: exalted, pure pages,

arabic_text: بِأَيْدِى سَفَرَةٍ
translation: by the hands of

arabic_text: كِرَامٍۭ بَرَرَةٍ
translation: noble and virtuous scribes.

arabic_text: قُتِلَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَآ أَكْفَرَهُۥ
translation: Woe to man! How ungrateful he is!

arabic_text: مِنْ أَىِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ
translation: From what thing does God create him?

arabic_text: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ
translation: He creates him from a droplet, He proportions him,

arabic_text: ثُمَّ ٱلسَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُۥ
translation: He makes the way easy for him,

arabic_text: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقْبَرَهُۥ
translation: then He causes him to die and be buried.

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَآءَ أَنشَرَهُۥ
translation: When He wills, He will raise him up again.

arabic_text: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَآ أَمَرَهُۥ
translation: Yet man does not fulfil God’s commands.

arabic_text: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ
translation: Let man consider the food he eats!

arabic_text: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا ٱلْمَآءَ صَبًّا
translation: We pour down abundant water

arabic_text: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ شَقًّا
translation: and cause the soil to split open.

arabic_text: فَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا
translation: We make grain grow,

arabic_text: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا
translation: and vines, fresh vegetation,

arabic_text: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا
translation: olive trees, date palms,

arabic_text: وَحَدَآئِقَ غُلْبًا
translation: luscious gardens,

arabic_text: وَفَـٰكِهَةً وَأَبًّا
translation: fruits, and fodder:

arabic_text: مَّتَـٰعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَـٰمِكُمْ
translation: all for you and your livestock to enjoy.

arabic_text: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلصَّآخَّةُ
translation: When the Deafening Blast comes––

arabic_text: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ ٱلْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
translation: the Day man will flee from his own brother,

arabic_text: وَأُمِّهِۦ وَأَبِيهِ
translation: his mother, his father,

arabic_text: وَصَـٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَبَنِيهِ
translation: his wife, his children:

arabic_text: لِكُلِّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
translation: each of them will be absorbed in concerns of their own on that Day-

arabic_text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُّسْفِرَةٌ
translation: on that Day some faces will be beaming,

arabic_text: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌ
translation: laughing, and rejoicing,

arabic_text: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ
translation: but some faces will be dust-stained

arabic_text: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
translation: and covered in darkness:

arabic_text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْكَفَرَةُ ٱلْفَجَرَةُ
translation: those are the disbelievers, the licentious.

arabic_text: إِذَا ٱلشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
translation: When the sun is shrouded in darkness,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ ٱنكَدَرَتْ
translation: when the stars are dimmed,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
translation: when the mountains are set in motion,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
translation: when pregnant camels are abandoned,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
translation: when wild beasts are herded together,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
translation: when the seas boil over,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
translation: when souls are sorted into classes,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلْمَوْءُۥدَةُ سُئِلَتْ
translation: when the baby girl buried alive is asked

arabic_text: بِأَىِّ ذَنۢبٍ قُتِلَتْ
translation: for what sin she was killed,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
translation: when the records of deeds are spread open,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ كُشِطَتْ
translation: when the sky is stripped away,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
translation: when Hell is made to blaze

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
translation: and Paradise brought near:

arabic_text: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّآ أَحْضَرَتْ
translation: then every soul will know what it has brought about.

arabic_text: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلْخُنَّسِ
translation: I swear by the planets

arabic_text: ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْكُنَّسِ
translation: that recede, move, and hide,

arabic_text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
translation: by the night that descends,

arabic_text: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
translation: by the dawn that softly breathes:

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
translation: this is the speech of a noble messenger,

arabic_text: ذِى قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِى ٱلْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
translation: who possesses great strength and is held in honour by the Lord of the Throne––

arabic_text: مُّطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ
translation: he is obeyed there and worthy of trust.

arabic_text: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍ
translation: Your companion is not mad:

arabic_text: وَلَقَدْ رَءَاهُ بِٱلْأُفُقِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
translation: he did see him on the clear horizon.

arabic_text: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى ٱلْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ
translation: He does not withhold what is revealed to him from beyond.

arabic_text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَـٰنٍ رَّجِيمٍ
translation: This is not the word of an outcast devil.

arabic_text: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
translation: So where are you [people] going?

arabic_text: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
translation: This is a message for all people;

arabic_text: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
translation: for those who wish to take the straight path.

arabic_text: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
translation: But you will only wish to do so by the will of God, the Lord of all people.

arabic_text: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنفَطَرَتْ
translation: When the sky is torn apart,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلْكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتْ
translation: when the stars are scattered,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
translation: when the seas burst forth,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
translation: when graves turn inside out:

arabic_text: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
translation: each soul will know what it has done and what it has left undone.

arabic_text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
translation: Mankind, what has lured you away from God,

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّىٰكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
translation: your generous Lord, who created you, shaped you, proportioned you,

arabic_text: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
translation: in whatever form He chose?

arabic_text: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِٱلدِّينِ
translation: Yet you still take the Judgement to be a lie!

arabic_text: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَـٰفِظِينَ
translation: Over you stand

arabic_text: كِرَامًا كَـٰتِبِينَ
translation: watchers, noble recorders

arabic_text: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
translation: who know what you do:

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍ
translation: the good will live in bliss,

arabic_text: وَإِنَّ ٱلْفُجَّارَ لَفِى جَحِيمٍ
translation: and the wicked will burn in the Fire.

arabic_text: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
translation: They will enter it on the Day of Judgement

arabic_text: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَآئِبِينَ
translation: and they will find no escape.

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
translation: What will explain to you what the Day of Judgement is?

arabic_text: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
translation: Yes! What will explain to you what the Day of Judgement is?

arabic_text: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْـًٔا ۖ وَٱلْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
translation: The Day when no soul will be able to do anything for another; on that Day, command will belong to God.

arabic_text: وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
translation: Woe to those who give short measure,

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
translation: who demand of other people full measure for themselves,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
translation: but give less than they should when it is they who weigh or measure for others!

arabic_text: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
translation: Do these people not realize that they will be raised up

arabic_text: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
translation: on a mighty Day,

arabic_text: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
translation: a Day when everyone will stand before the Lord of the Worlds?

arabic_text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلْفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجِّينٍ
translation: No indeed! The list of the wicked is in Sijjin––

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ
translation: what will explain to you what Sijjin is?––

arabic_text: كِتَـٰبٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
translation: a clearly numbered list.

arabic_text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe on that day to the deniers,

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
translation: those who deny the Day of Judgement!

arabic_text: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
translation: Only the evil aggressor denies it:

arabic_text: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَـٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
translation: when Our revelations are recited to him, he says, ‘Ancient fables!’

arabic_text: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
translation: No indeed! Their hearts are encrusted with what they have done.

arabic_text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
translation: No indeed! On that Day they will be screened off from their Lord,

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُوا۟ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
translation: they will burn in Hell,

arabic_text: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
translation: and they will be told, ‘This is what you called a lie.’

arabic_text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيِّينَ
translation: No indeed! The list of the truly good is in 'Illiyyin––

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
translation: what will explain to you what 'Illiyyin is?––

arabic_text: كِتَـٰبٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
translation: a clearly written list,

arabic_text: يَشْهَدُهُ ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ
translation: witnessed by those brought near.

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍ
translation: The truly good will live in bliss,

arabic_text: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
translation: seated on couches, gazing around.

arabic_text: تَعْرِفُ فِى وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
translation: You will recognize on their faces the radiance of bliss.

arabic_text: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ مَّخْتُومٍ
translation: They will be served a sealed nectar,

arabic_text: خِتَـٰمُهُۥ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِى ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلْمُتَنَـٰفِسُونَ
translation: its seal [perfumed with] a fragrant herb––let those who strive, strive for this––

arabic_text: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
translation: mixed with the water of Tasnim,

arabic_text: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ
translation: a spring from which those brought near will drink.

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَضْحَكُونَ
translation: The wicked used to laugh at the believers––

arabic_text: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
translation: they would wink at one another when the believers passed by them,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِينَ
translation: joke about them when they got back to their own people,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
translation: and say, when they saw them, ‘These people are misguided,’

arabic_text: وَمَآ أُرْسِلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ حَـٰفِظِينَ
translation: though they were not sent to be their keepers-

arabic_text: فَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
translation: so today the believers are laughing at the disbelievers

arabic_text: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
translation: as they sit on couches, gazing around.

arabic_text: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ ٱلْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ
translation: Have the disbelievers [not] been repaid for their deeds?

arabic_text: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتْ
translation: When the sky is ripped apart,

arabic_text: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
translation: obeying its Lord as it rightly must,

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
translation: when the earth is levelled out,

arabic_text: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
translation: casts out its contents, and becomes empty,

arabic_text: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
translation: obeying its Lord as it rightly must,

arabic_text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَـٰقِيهِ
translation: you humans, toiling laboriously towards your Lord, will meet Him:

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ
translation: whoever is given his record in his right hand

arabic_text: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا
translation: will have an easy reckoning

arabic_text: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًا
translation: and return to his people well pleased,

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ
translation: but whoever is given his record from behind his back

arabic_text: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًا
translation: will cry out for destruction––

arabic_text: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
translation: he will burn in the blazing Fire.

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِىٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًا
translation: He used to live among his people well pleased.

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
translation: He thought he would never return [to his Lord]––

arabic_text: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًا
translation: indeed he will! His Lord was watching him.

arabic_text: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ
translation: I swear by the glow of sunset,

arabic_text: وَٱلَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
translation: by the night and what it covers,

arabic_text: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ
translation: by the full moon,

arabic_text: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍ
translation: you will progress from stage to stage.

arabic_text: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
translation: So why do they not believe?

arabic_text: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
translation: Why, when the Quran is read to them, do they not prostrate themselves [to God]?

arabic_text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُكَذِّبُونَ
translation: No! The disbelievers reject the Quran––

arabic_text: وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
translation: God knows best what they keep hidden inside––

arabic_text: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
translation: so give them news of a painful torment.

arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ
translation: But those who believe and do good deeds will have a never-ending reward.

arabic_text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْبُرُوجِ
translation: By the sky with its towering constellations,

arabic_text: وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْمَوْعُودِ
translation: by the promised Day,

arabic_text: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ
translation: by the Witness and that which is witnessed,

arabic_text: قُتِلَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأُخْدُودِ
translation: damned were the makers of the trench,

arabic_text: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلْوَقُودِ
translation: the makers of the fuel-stoked fire!

arabic_text: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ
translation: They sat down

arabic_text: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
translation: to watch what they were doing to the believers.

arabic_text: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
translation: Their only grievance against them was their faith in God, the Mighty, the Praiseworthy,

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
translation: to whom all control over the heavens and earth belongs: God is witness over all things.

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
translation: For those who persecute believing men and women, and do not repent afterwards, there will be the torment of Hell and burning.

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
translation: But for those who believe and do good deeds there will be Gardens graced with flowing streams: that is the great triumph.

arabic_text: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
translation: [Prophet], your Lord’s punishment is truly stern––

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
translation: it is He who brings people to life, and will restore them to life again––

arabic_text: وَهُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلْوَدُودُ
translation: and He is the Most Forgiving, the Most Loving.

arabic_text: ذُو ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْمَجِيدُ
translation: The Glorious Lord of the Throne,

arabic_text: فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
translation: He does whatever He will.

arabic_text: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْجُنُودِ
translation: Have you [not] heard the stories of the forces

arabic_text: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
translation: of Pharaoh and Thamud?

arabic_text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى تَكْذِيبٍ
translation: Yet still the disbelievers persist in denial.

arabic_text: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطٌۢ
translation: God surrounds them all.

arabic_text: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْءَانٌ مَّجِيدٌ
translation: This is truly a glorious Quran

arabic_text: فِى لَوْحٍ مَّحْفُوظٍۭ
translation: [written] on a preserved Tablet.

arabic_text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ
translation: By the sky and the night-comer––

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ
translation: What will explain to you what the night-comer is?

arabic_text: ٱلنَّجْمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ
translation: The piercing star––

arabic_text: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
translation: there is a watcher over every soul.

arabic_text: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
translation: Man should reflect on what he was created from.

arabic_text: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٍ دَافِقٍ
translation: He is created from spurting fluid,

arabic_text: يَخْرُجُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ ٱلصُّلْبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ
translation: then he emerges from between the backbone and breastbone:

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٌ
translation: God is certainly able to bring him back to life.

arabic_text: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ
translation: On the Day when secrets are laid bare

arabic_text: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
translation: he will have no power and no one to help him.

arabic_text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجْعِ
translation: By the sky and its recurring rain,

arabic_text: وَٱلْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدْعِ
translation: by the earth that cracks open!

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ
translation: This is truly a decisive statement;

arabic_text: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلْهَزْلِ
translation: it is not something to be taken lightly.

arabic_text: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا
translation: They plot and scheme,

arabic_text: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا
translation: but so do I:

arabic_text: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًۢا
translation: [Prophet], let the disbelievers be, let them be for a while.

arabic_text: سَبِّحِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلْأَعْلَى
translation: [Prophet], glorify the name of your Lord the Most High,

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
translation: who created [all things] in due proportion;

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِى قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
translation: who determined their destinies and guided them;

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَخْرَجَ ٱلْمَرْعَىٰ
translation: who brought out the green pasture

arabic_text: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحْوَىٰ
translation: then made it dark debris.

arabic_text: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ
translation: [Prophet], We shall teach you [the Quran] and you will not forget––

arabic_text: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
translation: unless God wishes; He knows both what is open and what is hidden––

arabic_text: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
translation: We shall show you the easy way.

arabic_text: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
translation: So remind, if reminding will help.

arabic_text: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ
translation: Those who stand in awe of God will heed the reminder,

arabic_text: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَشْقَى
translation: but it will be ignored by the most wicked,

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِى يَصْلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
translation: who will enter the Great Fire,

arabic_text: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
translation: where they will neither die nor live.

arabic_text: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
translation: Prosperous are those who purify themselves,

arabic_text: وَذَكَرَ ٱسْمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ
translation: remember the name of their Lord, and pray.

arabic_text: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
translation: Yet you [people] prefer the life of this world,

arabic_text: وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
translation: even though the Hereafter is better and more lasting.

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَفِى ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
translation: All this is in the earlier scriptures,

arabic_text: صُحُفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
translation: the scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

arabic_text: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْغَـٰشِيَةِ
translation: Have you heard tell [Prophet] about the Overwhelming Event?

arabic_text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَـٰشِعَةٌ
translation: On that Day, there will be downcast faces,

arabic_text: عَامِلَةٌ نَّاصِبَةٌ
translation: toiling and weary,

arabic_text: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةً
translation: as they enter the blazing Fire

arabic_text: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ ءَانِيَةٍ
translation: and are forced to drink from a boiling spring,

arabic_text: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ
translation: with no food for them except bitter dry thorns

arabic_text: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِن جُوعٍ
translation: that neither nourish nor satisfy hunger.

arabic_text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاعِمَةٌ
translation: On that Day there will also be faces radiant with bliss,

arabic_text: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ
translation: well pleased with their labour,

arabic_text: فِى جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
translation: in a lofty garden,

arabic_text: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَـٰغِيَةً
translation: where they will hear no idle talk,

arabic_text: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ
translation: with a flowing spring,

arabic_text: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَّرْفُوعَةٌ
translation: raised couches,

arabic_text: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَّوْضُوعَةٌ
translation: goblets placed before them,

arabic_text: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ
translation: cushions set in rows,

arabic_text: وَزَرَابِىُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
translation: and carpets spread.

arabic_text: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
translation: Do the disbelievers not see how rain clouds are formed <sup foot_note=77646>1</sup>

arabic_text: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
translation: how the heavens are lifted,

arabic_text: وَإِلَى ٱلْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
translation: how the mountains are raised high,

arabic_text: وَإِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
translation: how the earth is spread out?

arabic_text: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌ
translation: So [Prophet] warn them: your only task is to give warning,

arabic_text: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
translation: you are not there to control them.

arabic_text: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
translation: As for those who turn away and disbelieve,

arabic_text: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَكْبَرَ
translation: God will inflict the greatest torment upon them.

arabic_text: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَآ إِيَابَهُمْ
translation: It is to Us they will return,

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم
translation: and then it is for Us to call them to account.

arabic_text: وَٱلْفَجْرِ
translation: By the Daybreak,

arabic_text: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ
translation: by the Ten Nights,

arabic_text: وَٱلشَّفْعِ وَٱلْوَتْرِ
translation: by the even and the odd,

arabic_text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
translation: by the passing night––

arabic_text: هَلْ فِى ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِى حِجْرٍ
translation: is this oath strong enough for a rational person?

arabic_text: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
translation: Have you [Prophet] considered how your Lord dealt with [the people] of 'Ad,

arabic_text: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلْعِمَادِ
translation: of Iram, [the city] of lofty pillars,

arabic_text: ٱلَّتِى لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ
translation: whose like has never been made in any land,

arabic_text: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُوا۟ ٱلصَّخْرَ بِٱلْوَادِ
translation: and the Thamud, who hewed into the rocks in the valley,

arabic_text: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِى ٱلْأَوْتَادِ
translation: and the mighty and powerful Pharaoh?

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ
translation: All of them committed excesses in their lands,

arabic_text: فَأَكْثَرُوا۟ فِيهَا ٱلْفَسَادَ
translation: and spread corruption there:

arabic_text: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
translation: your Lord let a scourge of punishment loose on them.

arabic_text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلْمِرْصَادِ
translation: Your Lord is always watchful.

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكْرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَكْرَمَنِ
translation: [The nature of] man is that, when his Lord tries him through honour and blessings, he says, ‘My Lord has honoured me,’

arabic_text: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَهَـٰنَنِ
translation: but when He tries him through the restriction of his provision, he says, ‘My Lord has humiliated me.’

arabic_text: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ ٱلْيَتِيمَ
translation: No indeed! You [people] do not honour orphans,

arabic_text: وَلَا تَحَـٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
translation: you do not urge one another to feed the poor,

arabic_text: وَتَأْكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَّمًّا
translation: you consume inheritance greedily,

arabic_text: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا
translation: and you love wealth with a passion.

arabic_text: كَلَّآ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
translation: No indeed! When the earth is pounded to dust, pounded and pounded,

arabic_text: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا
translation: when your Lord comes with the angels, rank upon rank,

arabic_text: وَجِا۟ىٓءَ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
translation: when Hell is that Day brought near- on that Day man will take heed, but what good will that be to him then?

arabic_text: يَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِى
translation: He will say, ‘Would that I had provided for this life to come!’

arabic_text: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
translation: On that Day, no one will punish as He punishes,

arabic_text: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
translation: and no one will bind as He binds.

arabic_text: يَـٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفْسُ ٱلْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
translation: ‘[But] you, soul at peace:

arabic_text: ٱرْجِعِىٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً
translation: return to your Lord well pleased and well pleasing;

arabic_text: فَٱدْخُلِى فِى عِبَـٰدِى
translation: go in among My servants;

arabic_text: وَٱدْخُلِى جَنَّتِى
translation: and into My Garden.’

arabic_text: لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
translation: I swear by this city––

arabic_text: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّۢ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
translation: and you [Prophet] are an inhabitant of this city––

arabic_text: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ
translation: [I swear] by parent and offspring,

arabic_text: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ فِى كَبَدٍ
translation: that We have created man for toil and trial.

arabic_text: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
translation: Does he think that no one will have power over him?

arabic_text: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُّبَدًا
translation: ‘I have squandered great wealth,’ he says.

arabic_text: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
translation: Does he think no one observes him?

arabic_text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ عَيْنَيْنِ
translation: Did We not give him eyes,

arabic_text: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
translation: a tongue, lips,

arabic_text: وَهَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلنَّجْدَيْنِ
translation: and point out to him the two clear ways [of good and evil]?

arabic_text: فَلَا ٱقْتَحَمَ ٱلْعَقَبَةَ
translation: Yet he has not attempted the steep path.

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْعَقَبَةُ
translation: What will explain to you what the steep path is?

arabic_text: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
translation: It is to free a slave,

arabic_text: أَوْ إِطْعَـٰمٌ فِى يَوْمٍ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍ
translation: to feed at a time of hunger

arabic_text: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
translation: an orphaned relative

arabic_text: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ
translation: or a poor person in distress,

arabic_text: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ
translation: and to be one of those who believe and urge one another to steadfastness and compassion.

arabic_text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ
translation: Those who do this will be on the right-hand side,

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ
translation: but those who disbelieve in Our revelations will be on the left-hand side,

arabic_text: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُّؤْصَدَةٌۢ
translation: and the Fire will close in on them.

arabic_text: وَٱلشَّمْسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا
translation: By the sun in its morning brightness

arabic_text: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا
translation: and by the moon as it follows it,

arabic_text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا
translation: by the day as it displays the sun’s glory

arabic_text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰهَا
translation: and by the night as it conceals it,

arabic_text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا
translation: by the sky and how He built it

arabic_text: وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا
translation: and by the earth and how He spread it,

arabic_text: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا
translation: by the soul and how He formed it

arabic_text: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَىٰهَا
translation: and inspired it [to know] its own rebellion and piety!

arabic_text: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا
translation: The one who purifies his soul succeeds

arabic_text: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا
translation: and the one who corrupts it fails.

arabic_text: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَىٰهَآ
translation: In their arrogant cruelty, the people of Thamud called [their messenger] a liar,

arabic_text: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشْقَىٰهَا
translation: when the most wicked man among them rose [against him].

arabic_text: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقْيَـٰهَا
translation: The messenger of God said to them, ‘[Leave] God’s camel to drink,’

arabic_text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
translation: but they called him a liar and hamstrung her. Their Lord destroyed them for their crime and levelled them.

arabic_text: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَـٰهَا
translation: He did not hesitate to punish them.

arabic_text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
translation: By the enshrouding night,

arabic_text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
translation: by the radiant day,

arabic_text: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ
translation: by His creation of male and female!

arabic_text: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
translation: The ways you take differ greatly.

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ
translation: There is the one who gives, who is mindful of God,

arabic_text: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
translation: who testifies to goodness––

arabic_text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
translation: We shall smooth his way towards ease.

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسْتَغْنَىٰ
translation: There is the one who is miserly, who is self-satisfied,

arabic_text: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
translation: who denies goodness––

arabic_text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
translation: We shall smooth his way towards hardship

arabic_text: وَمَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
translation: and his wealth will not help him as he falls.

arabic_text: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
translation: Our part is to provide guidance––

arabic_text: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْـَٔاخِرَةَ وَٱلْأُولَىٰ
translation: this world and the next belong to Us––

arabic_text: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّىٰ
translation: so I warn you about the raging Fire,

arabic_text: لَا يَصْلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلْأَشْقَى
translation: in which none but the most wicked one will burn,

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِى كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
translation: who denied [the truth], and turned away.

arabic_text: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَتْقَى
translation: The most pious one will be spared this––

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِى يُؤْتِى مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
translation: who gives his wealth away as self-purification,

arabic_text: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰٓ
translation: not to return a favour to anyone

arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱبْتِغَآءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
translation: but for the sake of his Lord the Most High––

arabic_text: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
translation: and he will be well pleased.

arabic_text: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ
translation: By the morning brightness

arabic_text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
translation: and by the night when it grows still,

arabic_text: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
translation: your Lord has not forsaken you [Prophet], nor does He hate you,

arabic_text: وَلَلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
translation: and the future will be better for you than the past;

arabic_text: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰٓ
translation: your Lord is sure to give you so much that you will be well satisfied.

arabic_text: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَـَٔاوَىٰ
translation: Did He not find you an orphan and shelter you?

arabic_text: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلًّا فَهَدَىٰ
translation: Did He not find you lost and guide you?

arabic_text: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلًا فَأَغْنَىٰ
translation: Did He not find you in need and make you self-sufficient?

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا ٱلْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
translation: So do not be harsh with the orphan

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
translation: and do not chide the one who asks for help;

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
translation: talk about the blessings of your Lord.

arabic_text: أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
translation: Did We not relieve your heart for you [Prophet],

arabic_text: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
translation: and remove the burden

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
translation: that weighed so heavily on your back,

arabic_text: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
translation: and raise your reputation high?

arabic_text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
translation: So truly where there is hardship there is also ease;

arabic_text: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
translation: truly where there is hardship there is also ease.

arabic_text: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَٱنصَبْ
translation: The moment you are freed [of one task] work on,

arabic_text: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرْغَب
translation: and turn to your Lord for everything.

arabic_text: وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيْتُونِ
translation: By the fig, by the olive,

arabic_text: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
translation: by Mount Sinai,

arabic_text: وَهَـٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ ٱلْأَمِينِ
translation: by this safe town,

arabic_text: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
translation: We create man in the finest state

arabic_text: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَـٰهُ أَسْفَلَ سَـٰفِلِينَ
translation: then reduce him to the lowest of the low,

arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
translation: except those who believe and do good deeds–– they will have an unfailing reward.

arabic_text: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِٱلدِّينِ
translation: After this, what makes you [man] deny the Judgement?

arabic_text: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ ٱلْحَـٰكِمِينَ
translation: Is God not the most decisive of judges?

arabic_text: ٱقْرَأْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ
translation: Read! In the name of your Lord who created:

arabic_text: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
translation: He created manfrom a clinging form.

arabic_text: ٱقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلْأَكْرَمُ
translation: Read! Your Lord is the Most Bountiful One

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَ بِٱلْقَلَمِ
translation: who taught by [means of] the pen,

arabic_text: عَلَّمَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
translation: who taught man what he did not know.

arabic_text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لَيَطْغَىٰٓ
translation: But man exceeds all bounds

arabic_text: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰٓ
translation: when he thinks he is self-sufficient:

arabic_text: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجْعَىٰٓ
translation: [Prophet], all will return to your Lord.

arabic_text: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يَنْهَىٰ
translation: Have you seen the man who forbids

arabic_text: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ
translation: [Our] servant to pray?

arabic_text: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
translation: Have you seen whether he is rightly guided,

arabic_text: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقْوَىٰٓ
translation: or encourages true piety?

arabic_text: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
translation: Have you seen whether he denies the truth and turns away from it?

arabic_text: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
translation: Does he not realize that God sees all?

arabic_text: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
translation: No! If he does not stop, We shall drag him by his forehead––

arabic_text: نَاصِيَةٍ كَـٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ
translation: his lying, sinful forehead.

arabic_text: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُۥ
translation: Let him summon his comrades;

arabic_text: سَنَدْعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ
translation: We shall summon the guards of Hell.

arabic_text: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَٱسْجُدْ وَٱقْتَرِب ۩
translation: No! Do not obey him [Prophet]: bow down in worship and draw close.

arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةِ ٱلْقَدْرِ
translation: We sent it down on the Night of Glory.

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ
translation: What will explain to you what that Night of Glory is?

arabic_text: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
translation: The Night of Glory is better than a thousand months;

arabic_text: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
translation: on that night the angels and the Spirit descend again and again with their Lord’s permission on every task;

arabic_text: سَلَـٰمٌ هِىَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ ٱلْفَجْرِ
translation: [there is] peace that night until the break of dawn.

arabic_text: لَمْ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
translation: Those who disbelieve among the People of the Book and the idolaters were not about to change their ways until they were sent clear evidence,

arabic_text: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتْلُوا۟ صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً
translation: a messenger from God, reading out pages [blessed with] purity,

arabic_text: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ
translation: containing true scriptures.

arabic_text: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
translation: [Yet] those who were given the Scripture became divided only after they were sent [such] clear evi-dence

arabic_text: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلْقَيِّمَةِ
translation: though all they are ordered to do is worship God alone, sincerely devoting their religion to Him as people of true faith, keep up the prayer, and pay the prescribed alms, for that is the true religion.

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
translation: Those who disbelieve among the People of the Book and the idolaters will have the Fire of Hell, there to remain. They are the worst of creation.

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
translation: Those who believe and do good deeds are the best of creation.

arabic_text: جَزَآؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۖ رَّضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِىَ رَبَّهُۥ
translation: Their reward with their Lord is everlasting Gardens graced with flowing streams, where they will stay forever. God is well pleased with them and they with Him. All this is for those who stand in awe of their Lord.

arabic_text: إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
translation: When the earth is shaken violently in its [last] quaking,

arabic_text: وَأَخْرَجَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
translation: when the earth throws out its burdens,

arabic_text: وَقَالَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا لَهَا
translation: when man cries, ‘What is happening to it?’;

arabic_text: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
translation: on that Day, it will tell all

arabic_text: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
translation: because your Lord will inspire it [to do so].

arabic_text: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
translation: On that Day, people will come forward in separate groups to be shown their deeds:

arabic_text: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُۥ
translation: whoever has done an atom’s-weight of good will see it,

arabic_text: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُۥ
translation: but whoever has done an atom’s-weight of evil will see that.

arabic_text: وَٱلْعَـٰدِيَـٰتِ ضَبْحًا
translation: By the charging steeds that pant

arabic_text: فَٱلْمُورِيَـٰتِ قَدْحًا
translation: and strike sparks with their hooves,

arabic_text: فَٱلْمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبْحًا
translation: who make dawn raids,

arabic_text: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِۦ نَقْعًا
translation: raising a cloud of dust,

arabic_text: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِۦ جَمْعًا
translation: and plunging into the midst of the enemy,

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٌ
translation: man is ungrateful to his Lord––

arabic_text: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ
translation: and He is witness to this––

arabic_text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
translation: he is truly excessive in his love of wealth.

arabic_text: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ
translation: Does he not know that when the contents of graves burst forth,

arabic_text: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ
translation: when the secrets of hearts are uncovered, on that Day,

arabic_text: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّخَبِيرٌۢ
translation: their Lord will be fully aware of them all?

arabic_text: ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
translation: The Crashing Blow!

arabic_text: مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
translation: What is the Crashing Blow?

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
translation: What will explain to you what the Crashing Blow is?

arabic_text: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلْفَرَاشِ ٱلْمَبْثُوثِ
translation: On a Day when people will be like scattered moths

arabic_text: وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ ٱلْمَنفُوشِ
translation: and the mountains like tufts of wool,

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
translation: the one whose good deeds are heavy on the scales

arabic_text: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
translation: will have a pleasant life,

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
translation: but the one whose good deeds are light

arabic_text: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٌ
translation: will have the Bottomless Pit for his home––

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا هِيَهْ
translation: what will explain to you what that is?––

arabic_text: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌۢ
translation: a blazing fire.

arabic_text: أَلْهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ
translation: Striving for more distracts you

arabic_text: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ ٱلْمَقَابِرَ
translation: until you go into your graves.

arabic_text: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
translation: No indeed! You will come to know.

arabic_text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
translation: No indeed! In the end you will come to know.

arabic_text: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ ٱلْيَقِينِ
translation: No indeed! If only you knew for certain.

arabic_text: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ
translation: You will most definitely see Hellfire,

arabic_text: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ ٱلْيَقِينِ
translation: you will see it with the eye of certainty.

arabic_text: ثُمَّ لَتُسْـَٔلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
translation: On that Day, you will be asked about your pleasures.

arabic_text: وَٱلْعَصْرِ
translation: By the declining day,

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لَفِى خُسْرٍ
translation: man is [deep] in loss,

arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ
translation: except for those who believe, do good deeds, urge one another to the truth, and urge one another to steadfastness.

arabic_text: وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُّمَزَةٍ
translation: Woe to every fault-finding backbiter

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِى جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ
translation: who amasses riches, counting them over,

arabic_text: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَهُۥ
translation: thinking they will make him live for ever.

arabic_text: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِى ٱلْحُطَمَةِ
translation: No indeed! He will be thrust into the Crusher!

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْحُطَمَةُ
translation: What will explain to you what the Crusher is?

arabic_text: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُوقَدَةُ
translation: It is God’s Fire, made to blaze,

arabic_text: ٱلَّتِى تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةِ
translation: which rises over people’s hearts.

arabic_text: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
translation: It closes in on them

arabic_text: فِى عَمَدٍ مُّمَدَّدَةٍۭ
translation: in towering columns.

arabic_text: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ
translation: Do you [Prophet] not see how your Lord dealt with the army of the elephant?

arabic_text: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِى تَضْلِيلٍ
translation: Did He not utterly confound their plans?

arabic_text: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
translation: He sent ranks of birds against them,

arabic_text: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
translation: pelting them with pellets of hard-baked clay:

arabic_text: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَّأْكُولٍۭ
translation: He made them [like] cropped stubble.

arabic_text: لِإِيلَـٰفِ قُرَيْشٍ
translation: [He did this] to make the Quraysh feel secure,

arabic_text: إِۦلَـٰفِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيْفِ
translation: secure in their winter and summer journeys.

arabic_text: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّ هَـٰذَا ٱلْبَيْتِ
translation: So let them worship the Lord of this House:

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ
translation: who provides them with food to ward off hunger, safety to ward off fear.

arabic_text: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ
translation: [Prophet], have you considered the person who denies the Judgement?

arabic_text: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِى يَدُعُّ ٱلْيَتِيمَ
translation: It is he who pushes aside the orphan

arabic_text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
translation: and does not urge others to feed the needy.

arabic_text: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ
translation: So woe to those who pray

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
translation: but are heedless of their prayer;

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَآءُونَ
translation: those who are all show

arabic_text: وَيَمْنَعُونَ ٱلْمَاعُونَ
translation: and forbid common kindnesses.

arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَعْطَيْنَـٰكَ ٱلْكَوْثَرَ
translation: We have truly given abundance to you [Prophet]––

arabic_text: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنْحَرْ
translation: so pray to your Lord and make your sacrifice to Him alone––

arabic_text: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلْأَبْتَرُ
translation: it is the one who hates you who has been cut off.

arabic_text: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
translation: Say [Prophet], ‘Disbelievers:

arabic_text: لَآ أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
translation: I do not worship what you worship,

arabic_text: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَـٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ
translation: you do not worship what I worship,

arabic_text: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدٌ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ
translation: I will never worship what you worship,

arabic_text: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَـٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ
translation: you will never worship what I worship:

arabic_text: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِىَ دِينِ
translation: you have your religion and I have mine.’

arabic_text: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْفَتْحُ
translation: When God’s help comes and He opens up your way [Prophet],

arabic_text: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
translation: when you see people embracing God’s faith in crowds,

arabic_text: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
translation: celebrate the praise of your Lord and ask His forgiveness: He is always ready to accept repentance.

arabic_text: تَبَّتْ يَدَآ أَبِى لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ
translation: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined! May he be ruined too!

arabic_text: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
translation: Neither his wealth nor his gains will help him:

arabic_text: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ
translation: he will burn in the Flaming Fire––

arabic_text: وَٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلْحَطَبِ
translation: and so will his wife, the firewood-carrier,

arabic_text: فِى جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِّن مَّسَدٍۭ
translation: with a palm-fibre rope around her neck.

arabic_text: قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
translation: Say, ‘He is God the One,

arabic_text: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ
translation: God the eternal.

arabic_text: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
translation: He begot no one nor was He begotten.

arabic_text: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌۢ
translation: No one is comparable to Him.’

arabic_text: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ
translation: Say [Prophet], ‘I seek refuge with the Lord of daybreak

arabic_text: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
translation: against the harm in what He has created,

arabic_text: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
translation: the harm in the night when darkness gathers,

arabic_text: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّـٰثَـٰتِ فِى ٱلْعُقَدِ
translation: the harm in witches when they blow on knots,

arabic_text: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
translation: the harm in the envier when he envies.’

arabic_text: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ
translation: Say, ‘I seek refuge with the Lord of people,

arabic_text: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ
translation: the Controller of people,

arabic_text: إِلَـٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ
translation: the God of people,

arabic_text: مِن شَرِّ ٱلْوَسْوَاسِ ٱلْخَنَّاسِ
translation: against the harm of the slinking whisperer––

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِى يُوَسْوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ
translation: who whispers into the hearts of people––

arabic_text: مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ
translation: whether they be jinn or people.’
